video:video.video:description: Fastenal is the largest distributor of fasteners in North America with nearly 500,000 products on their websites. Their various public websites contain only a small subset of the entire product lists used by employees and commercial customers. Their entire product line and related details are indexed and stored in Elasticsearch to support search across their complete catalog.See an in-depth demo of their product search, learn how Fastenal builds their indexes nightly, and learn how their IT team uses the Elastic Stack to build a better customer experience.

video:video.video:title: Elastic, DevSecOps, and the DOD software factory
video:video.video:description: The Department of Defense (DoD) and many other organizations are moving towards Agile and infrastructure as code (IaC). This shift improves efficiency and provides more robust security, leading to capabilities such as continuous monitoring and shortened authorization to operate timeframes. Learn more about the DoD software factory and how Elastic fits in.

video:video.video:title: Opening keynote | EMEA
video:video.video:description: Kick off ElasticON Global with Elastic Founder and CEO Shay Banon. Learn how we've evolved from the Elastic Stack to three solutions for enterprise search, observability, and security. Hear about our latest features and products as well as what's on the horizon. See how our solutions are driving customer success and innovation with live demos from Elastic product and engineering experts. Shay will be joined by the CEO of Google Cloud to talk about Elastic's partnership with Google Cloud. Then hear from the GM Digital Emerging Technologies and VP of IT Innovation at Shell International as he shares how the Elastic Stack has helped them innovate and implement solutions for today and tomorrow.

video:video.video:title: Integrating Human Genetic Data to Help Drive Drug Discovery: Elastic @ Merck
video:video.video:description: As genome sequencing’s costs have dramatically fallen, scientists have been awash in genetic data for novel research – but the existing tools and methods for analysis were not scaling well in terms of data size and harmonization, and they are also tedious, manual, and require a significant amount of expert integration. Daniel and Bhasker will share Merck’s journey with Elasticsearch, which has enabled them to harmonize a data ingestion pipeline and create a universal coordinate system for genetic variants as a backbone to help scientists uncover new insights on human genetics across a broad spectrum of diseases (from cancers, alzheimer’s, diabetes), and to aid in the discovery and validation of new therapies.

video:video.video:title: How to Make the Business Case for the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Concerned about justifying the money spent on open source technology to management? Want to know how to build and present a case for related expenses? Need help communicating the value these tools will bring back to the business?Because the Elastic Stack is open source, it’s not always obvious how to make the case to upper management about the benefits of a commercial relationship with Elastic. We will talk about approaches to answering all of the above questions and more.

video:video.video:title: Infrastructure monitoring made easy, from ingest to insight - EON Observability Europe 2021
video:video.video:description: Visibility into your infrastructure is critical, and the Elastic (ELK) Stack, brings its logging strengths to your metrics use case. Discover how simplified data onboarding with hundreds of prebuilt integrations, automated insights with alerting and machine learning, and new visual tools built for exploring infrastructure metrics are streamlining the monitoring use case.

video:video.video:title: Securing network operations at University of Nevada - Reno
video:video.video:description: The University of Nevada - Reno uses Elastic to ingest, analyze, and act upon insights derived from their log, metric, and SIEM data. This interview-style session will explore how the network operations team controls costs, reduces risk, and increases efficiency as they secure their data and their network with Elastic.

video:video.video:title: Yale: The Search for Cancer’s Causes and Cures
video:video.video:description: As a physician and software developer, Dr. Schulz manages the informatics related to next generation sequencing of cancer at the Yale Department of Laboratory Medicine. This talk will focus on how their team uses Elasticsearch to power their research database that is used by clinicians and researchers to identify novel causes of cancer, potential therapeutic targets, and determine if patients are eligible for clinical trials.

video:video.video:title: Realising the value of search - EON Public Sector Europe
video:video.video:description: Why do customers continue to invest in Elastic? Hear from a panel of public sector partners on how they adopted Elastic, how they use Elastic today, what they've learned along the way, and their plans for Elastic in the future.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Observability evolution and vision - EON Observability Europe 2021
video:video.video:description: Elastic Observability is helping organisations drive their mean time to resolution toward zero with end-to-end visibility in a single platform. Hear about the latest features and capabilities at all layers — from ingest to insight — and get a glimpse into the future straight from the product leaders who are building it.

video:video.video:title: Securing the Elastic Stack for free
video:video.video:description: Learn how to secure your Elastic Stack deployment for free using capabilities such as TLS encryption, role-based access control, and multi-tenancy features to support your organization’s needs. Elasticsearch and Kibana product management leaders will outline how to approach Elastic Stack security from a holistic perspective and share guidance as well as lessons learned.

video:video.video:title: Localizing Kibana for the Global Language Landscape
video:video.video:description: IBM and their customers identified the support for multiple languages localization as a key capability needed in Kibana in all visualization dashboards. In this talk, Martin and Shikha will describe the key aspects of Kibana globalization from design to capability delivered, as well as some of the design journey they took to get there. They will also provide the integration points for localization engineers who wish to add support for a particular language and plug-in authors adding or modifying Kibana plug-ins. It is an exciting journey not to be missed in the growth of Kibana and the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: Better together: How the Elastic solutions work in tandem
video:video.video:description: The Elastic Stack has always powered a wide variety of search use cases. Get a closer look at how some of the broader Elastic capabilities, such as machine learning anomaly detection and alerting, can be combined with Elastic Enterprise Search to enable powerful, customizable search projects.

video:video.video:title: Lessons learned from Elastic customers
video:video.video:description: Why do customers continue to invest in Elastic? Hear from a panel of public sector customers on how they adopted Elastic, how they use Elastic today, what they’ve learned along the way, and their plans for Elastic in the future.

video:video.video:title: KeyBank on their Elastic-powered observability platform
video:video.video:description: Join Steve Mayzak, Elastic Field CTO, and Norm Alfano, Senior Architect at KeyBank, for a fireside chat as they walk through the multiyear journey KeyBank took in completely redesigning their end-to-end enterprise monitoring systems. Learn how KeyBank has consolidated their 25+ point solutions into a single Elastic-powered observability platform, what the operational and opportunity costs have been, and how they are looking to further leverage and scale the platform going forward.

video:video.video:title: The importance of normalizing your security data to ECS
video:video.video:description: The Elastic Common Schema (ECS) can be used for SIEM, logging, APM, and more. See the different paths to adopting ECS for security and why data normalization is so critical. Learn how to map custom sources so they can be used by Elastic Security and how to implement custom pipelines that may require additional fields. We'll provide concrete examples and give pointers to relevant resources to help you get going.

video:video.video:title: Security thought leadership in education
video:video.video:description: Join leaders from all levels of education, from K-12 school districts to private and public higher education, as they discuss how security challenges have changed over time and how their institutions have adopted Elastic to help respond to the increasing threats. Panelists will join us from Birdville ISD, Tufts University, and Indiana University.

video:video.video:title: The Usual Suspects: Automatic Alerts to Monitor your Cluster
video:video.video:description: When monitoring met alerting, the average time spent to troubleshoot went down and the average sleep time went up. True story.X-Pack, which made its first debut with the 5.0 release of the Elastic Stack, brings monitoring and alerting features together to enable built-in cluster alerts. Chris and Bohyun will go over the latest in monitoring and management in the first portion of the talk, then Antonio will talk about how to solve real-world problems using monitoring data based on customer scenarios he's helped with as part of the Elastic support team.

video:video.video:title: Diving In The Deep End: Logging and Metrics at DigitalOcean
video:video.video:description: From server health checks to network monitoring to customer activity events — logs are everywhere at DigitalOcean. In a single day, we collect more than a terabyte of real-time log data over our entire operations infrastructure. Buried in that non-stop stream of data is everything we need to know to keep DigitalOcean's cloud services up and running. This talk covers how we collect, parse, route, store, and make this data available to operations and engineers while keeping things simple enough for a small team to manage.

video:video.video:title: Sipping from the Firehose: Scalable Endpoint Data for Incident Response
video:video.video:description: From the technical talent behind some of the on-screen hacks on USA Network’s Mr. Robot, this talk covers how to improve incident response by combining technologies like Elasticsearch with distributed, on-endpoint analysis for comprehensive, high-speed and efficient visibility at any scale.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Security: Unified protection for everyone - EON North America 2021
video:video.video:description: Prevent, detect, and respond to threats with Elastic Security, free and open for analysts everywhere. Built on the Elastic Stack, Elastic Security powers the SOC by eliminating blind spots, stopping threats at scale, and arming every analyst. Join this fast-moving session to see it in action.

video:video.video:title: Atlassian: Unleashing Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Atlassian is using Elasticsearch to power its internal logging platform, depended on by dozens of internal product teams. Find out how a small team is delivering big wins by choosing to build on top of Elasticsearch and AWS, and where they're taking Elasticsearch next.

video:video.video:title: Building Elastic into security operations
video:video.video:description: Learn how Optiv took foundational ideas around optimization of data ingestion, automation, and search to build world-class managed cybersecurity services with Elastic.

video:video.video:title: Using Elastic @ Elastic: Fast-tracking support search
video:video.video:description: Learn how an internal team at Elastic used Search UI, Elastic App Search, and Elastic Cloud to speed up development of a customer support portal search experience, reducing the time and effort needed to deliver an enhanced customer experience.

video:video.video:title: Shaping insight into results with Elastic App Search
video:video.video:description: Analyze, adapt. Rinse, repeat. Learn how to leverage the prebuilt search analytics in Elastic App Search and custom visualizations in Kibana to gain business insights. Then discover how to easily tune search relevance and results to create a better customer experience and drive ROI — with minimal technical effort.

video:video.video:title: Infrastructure monitoring made easy, from ingest to insight
video:video.video:description: Visibility into your infrastructure is critical — and the Elastic Stack brings its logging strengths to your metrics use case. Discover how simplified data onboarding with hundreds of prebuilt integrations, automated insights with alerting and machine learning, and new visual tools built for exploring infrastructure metrics are streamlining the monitoring use case.

video:video.video:title: Securing the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: From recent developments with TLS everywhere to what's on the horizon with encrypted settings and authentication protocols such as SAML and oAuth, the security world of the Elastic Stack is robust. Learn about existing Elastic Stack security features and plan ahead for developments coming in the future. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: Forever free and open Enterprise Search
video:video.video:description: There's always a budget for free. Join our engineering team leads as they take you through some of the free features they are most excited about. Explore all the no-cost capabilities you can use in Elastic App Search and Workplace Search to create rich search experiences for your customers and teams.

video:video.video:title: Elastic APM: Amping up your logs and metrics for the full picture
video:video.video:description: No matter where you are in your journey to cloud native, Elastic APM can help you deliver better customer experiences by spotting performance bottlenecks sooner and identifying regressions from new deployments faster. Learn how to get a complete view of the services that power your applications — from frontend to backend — to keep them running smoothly.

video:video.video:title: Reliable by Design: Applying Formal Methods to Distributed Systems
video:video.video:description: Building fast, scalable, and robust distributed systems such as Elasticsearch requires choosing the right algorithms for the right tasks. While many algorithms are readily available, often they need to be extended or adapted to fit the requirements of a real-world implementation. For instance, customizing or combining algorithms in non-trivial ways can easily break safety properties. Using formal methods in the development process of a distributed system helps to catch bugs in the design phase and reveal fundamental issues that testing might not easily uncover.Learn how the Elasticsearch team is making use of formal methods in the design of distributed algorithms. They'll discuss their specification methodology, toolset, and their experiences applying it to the data replication and cluster consensus algorithms in Elasticsearch. In particular, they'll focus on their recent work on these two core algorithms using the TLA+ toolbox (based on Lamport's Temporal Logic of Actions) and the Isabelle/HOL theorem prover system.

video:video.video:title: Faster business decisions and collaboration with Workplace Search
video:video.video:description: With a dizzying array of productivity and collaboration tools available on the market, learning how to maximize their usefulness — and your investment in them — is paramount. A unified search experience across all those sources of content ensures that your teams consistently see and share the right docs and data. See how less time spent searching means more time spent strategizing.

video:video.video:title: AsperTI: Technological data management for the Judiciary of Brazil
video:video.video:description: Saiba como a Asper e a Elastic desenharam uma solução para disponibilizar um projeto de armazenamento e busca de dados processuais com alta performance, segurança e objetividade.

video:video.video:title: What's the 411? Building Alerts on Elasticsearch @ Etsy
video:video.video:description: When working with a web application, you may find yourself drowning in logs. Some of this data is vital for debugging your application, and some can be a rich source of data for alerting. This talk will cover how Etsy constructs and responds to alert queries, as well as offer up ideas for additional types of alerts.

video:video.video:title: Get full visibility and find hidden security issues
video:video.video:description: Learn key practices in data collection and normalization to expand visibility into your environment. See how you can use Elastic Security to quickly and accurately triage, verify, and scope issues.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch Data Journey: Life of a Document in Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Ever wondered about the lifecycle of a single document in Elasticsearch? What happens when you index it? How does Elasticsearch ensure a document is replicated and found across the whole cluster reliably? Does deleting a document really physically remove the document from disk? How do we get from a blob of text and keywords to near real-time search and analytics?This talk will explain the when, where and why of your document's life inside of Elasticsearch. Alex and Boaz will take you through the journey of a document across a cluster, taking off with JSON and the curly braces, travelling through the network into the memory and all the analysis chains, heading further onto storage when writing into the transaction logs and Apache Lucene index, being read back by executing searches, all the way until the document is finally deleted.Even though this talk will cover a lot of different aspects, it's a talk for those who may be less familiar with core searchfunctionality. You do not need to be an Apache Lucene wizard to follow along and find this session useful.

video:video.video:title: Elastic{ON} 2016 Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: Elastic Founder & CEO Steven Schuurman, Elastic Founder & CTO Shay Banon, and other members of the Elastic engineering team kick off Elastic{ON} 2016 with company and product highlights from the past year as well as what to expect with the upcoming 5.0 release. You'll hear about updates coming to the Elastic Stack, learn about what the heck a Pack is, and see some awesome live demos of the new Kibana interface and Graph API. Jason McGee, VP and CTO of the IBM Cloud Platform, also shares how IBM leverages the Elastic Stack within its organization.

video:video.video:title: Monitoring the COVID-19 outbreak using the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: The outbreak of the COVID-19 has surprised a lot of different countries all over the world. In this virtual meetup we are going to see how easy it is to put data from the World Health Organization regarding COVID-19 in Elasticsearch and visualize them in Kibana.Enregistrement réalisé lors du Meetup ElasticFR Paris #44 virtuel.

video:video.video:title: Machine learning and the Elastic Stack: Everywhere you need it
video:video.video:description: From security detection rules to log categorization, machine learning capabilities in the Elastic Stack are tightly integrated to support a wide number of use cases. Learn how machine learning is both a differentiating horizontal capability within the Elastic Stack as well as a force multiplier within the Elastic Observability and Elastic Security solutions.

video:video.video:title: Stop attacks with Elastic's signatureless anti-malware model
video:video.video:description: Hear the data science perspective on malware protection, including a historical overview of key milestones in the development of MalwareScore, Elastic's machine learning-powered malware protection. Learn how MalwareScore distinguishes malicious from benign and how it is regularly retrained to combat advanced threats. You'll also learn about EMBER, an open source malware model and dataset.

video:video.video:title: Power and privilege in technology
video:video.video:description: In a landscape where many feel hindered by institutional bias, endeavoring for progress can feel insurmountable. This panel explores personal and professional experiences that have informed each panelist’s life, how they’ve overcome hurdles in the quest to establish their own spheres of influence, and how individuals, managers, and organizations can use their privilege to craft just, equitable, inclusive, and diverse cultures.

video:video.video:title: Monitoring Orange’s applications with the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Le défi d’Orange concernait la construction d’une architecture scalable à même de support le volume croissant de trafic. Orange a intégré pour cela la Suite Elastic au sein de leur solution hébergée sur le cloud, Erable. Cette solution aide à surveiller les applications de divertissement et de gestion de la relation client qui sont utilisées par près de 18 millions d'utilisateurs. La Suite Elastic est maintenant utilisée pour gérer à la fois les logs et les métriques. Aujourd’hui c’est un outil clé pour les utilisateurs et la prochaine étape sera l’expansion du cas d’usage au reste de  leur programme Cloud pour garantir l’observabilité de l’ensemble de l’écosystème d’Orange France.

video:video.video:title: Keeping Your Data From Getting Swiped Right Away: Security Analytics at Tinder
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch has been the core of Tinder's infrastructure since the beginning. The goal of connecting users around the world, with 1.4 billion swipes and 26 million matches daily, is powered by the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: What's Brewing in Beats? (2017)
video:video.video:description: Beats are a family of lightweight shippers that send data from edge machines to Elasticsearch. They started with a single Beat – Packetbeat – for network data, and have since expanded to four additional Elastic Beats for log files, metrics, windows event logs, and availability monitoring, and more than 30 community-created Beats for all kinds of operational data.In this session, Monica and Tudor will walk you through the latest Beats and their features. You will learn about the new Filebeat modules, which simplify the collection and parsing of common log files down to a single command. You will also see Heartbeat in action, our newest Beat responsible for uptime monitoring.

video:video.video:title: Operationalize with alerting, custom dashboards, and timelines
video:video.video:description: See how Elastic gives your security team customized visualizations and workflows you need to improve efficiency, streamline collaboration, and truly operationalize your security insights.

video:video.video:title: Streamline search with Elasticsearch Service on Microsoft Azure - EON North America 2021
video:video.video:description: Join Microsoft and learn about the best practices of running Elasticsearch Service in the Azure cloud, and how the partnership with Elastic makes it easier for you to deploy powerful search experiences in your Azure environment. You will also see joint service demos and hear about shared enterprise customer success stories.

video:video.video:title: Transforming SmartSOC services with Elastic Security
video:video.video:description: Durante esta sesión presentaremos cómo los servicios del SmartSOC de Entelgy Innotec Security se han transformado apoyados en la tecnología de Elastic Security, permitiendo ofrecer un modelo de servicio eficiente y modular, integrando en un mismo stack nuestras soluciones de SIEM, EDR y Threathunting as a Service, además, la flexibilidad de esta plataforma nos ha permitido generar métricas e indicadores operativos de los servicios y hacer seguimiento de los SLAs de los clientes. Además como partner de Elastic ponemos a disposición de nuestros clientes este conocimiento para quienes quieren de forma independiente desplegar estas capacidades internamente o a través de servicios gestionados.

video:video.video:title: Cybersecurity: Intelligence, innovation, and information warfare
video:video.video:description: Companies and governments are increasingly dependent upon innovations in digital technologies to achieve their missions. But as the digital world becomes increasingly complex and interconnected, cybercriminals and nation-state adversaries are taking advantage of the same technological advances and innovating at a rapid pace. If security depends on staying a step ahead, then how should we think about this new world, and how can we succeed in it?

video:video.video:title: Building a centralized observability platform (Americas)
video:video.video:description: Successful observability initiatives hinge on the platform teams that manage centralized tooling and frameworks. See how Elastic Observability empowers them to create centers of excellence (and deliver on observability as a service) with features like central management for agents, automated log categorization, index lifecycle management, and searchable snapshots.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Observability evolution and vision
video:video.video:description: Elastic Observability helps organizations drive their mean time to resolution toward zero with end-to-end visibility in a single platform. Hear about the latest features and capabilities at all layers — from ingest to insight — and get a glimpse into the future straight from the product leaders who are building it.

video:video.video:title: Tackling Cyber with RockNSM
video:video.video:description: Cyber is a human versus human problem. RockNSM covers your data gaps and delivers information to your humans so they can find the adversary.

video:video.video:title: Connecting the Dots with Elasticsearch...Tracing of Events within ING
video:video.video:description: Leaving behind a world of isolated departments and applications, ING has now embraced the omnichannel approach. Teams are working closely together, but are lacking the visibility needed across systems. This is how ING solves the problem of tracing events in a complex software environment.

video:video.video:title: Managing the Elastic Stack at Scale
video:video.video:description: Get tips directly from the experts at Elastic about planning for, monitoring, and troubleshooting the Elastic Stack at scale. Elastic experts will share the tools, strategies, and architectures that can be used to ensure cluster health and performance. Learn about using tools like automated alerting to identify and remediate issues rapidly. Walk away armed with best practices for how to ensure both cluster and data resiliency.

video:video.video:title: Why you should use Elastic for infrastructure metrics
video:video.video:description: Widely known for full-text search and logging, the Elastic Stack has evolved into a compelling solution for infrastructure metrics use cases. From fast and efficient time series datastore to integrations for onboarding common service metrics and dedicated UIs for visual exploration, see the many reasons to start using Elastic for your infrastructure metrics use case today.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Security evolution and vision
video:video.video:description: Learn how Elastic Security has evolved to help SecOps teams take a broader, more inclusive approach to security and set their organizations up for success.

video:video.video:title: IBM Bluemix Platform Logging with the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: IBM Bluemix platform logs to the Elastic stack. Learn about the flexibility of our logging solutions in microservice environments. See Docker and Cloud Foundry logging – no user configuration necessary. Runtime logs are easily added. In this session, Charlie and Ray will show an example logging from a Watson service. They'll also share details on their capabilities as well as how they deliver cloud scale logging built on the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: What's new at Elastic: Update on major initiatives and releases - EON Public Sector US State & Federal
video:video.video:description: The first technical talk of the event will highlight the latest releases at Elastic with specific insight into how those changes impact public sector projects. See the inside view of the most important capabilities and hear predictions on the developments that will be most applicable in our industry.

video:video.video:title: Operationally useful anomaly detection systems
video:video.video:description: Learn about the key system and data modeling challenges for performing anomaly detection on large complex systems in near real time. You'll see how Elastic approaches these problems as we illustrate how the specific modeling choices affect the quality of results. We'll also briefly survey other popular time series modeling techniques and assess their suitability for anomaly detection.

video:video.video:title: Opening keynote | Asia Pacific
video:video.video:description: Kick off ElasticON Global with Elastic Founder and CEO Shay Banon. Learn how we've evolved from the Elastic Stack to three solutions for enterprise search, observability, and security. Hear about our latest features and products as well as what's on the horizon. See how our solutions are driving customer success and innovation with live demos from Elastic product and engineering experts. Shay will be joined by the CEO of Google Cloud to talk about Elastic's partnership with Google Cloud. Then hear from the Head of Information Security for King & Wood Mallesons as he shares how the Elastic Stack has helped them innovate and implement solutions for today and tomorrow.

video:video.video:title: Modernizing deployment in any environment with Elastic
video:video.video:description: Many government organizations were already in various stages of adopting cloud strategies, but with recent global events this movement has dramatically accelerated. Find out how Elastic is helping with this shift by providing agencies with seamless and flexible deployment options that allow them to choose among on-prem, private VPCs, and public SaaS (authorized FedRAMP Moderate on GovCloud) to deploy the right workload in the right place.

video:video.video:title: Migrating to Elasticsearch Service on Elastic Cloud
video:video.video:description: Learn how to get started with migrating your cluster to Elastic Cloud. Hear about the best practices and strategies for migrating your clusters and data to Elastic Cloud. The topics we'll cover include deployment sizing, indexing your data, restoring from snapshots, and more.

video:video.video:title: What's new at Elastic: Update on major initiatives and releases - EON Public Sector US Federal
video:video.video:description: The first technical talk of the event will highlight the latest releases at Elastic with specific insight into how those changes impact public sector projects. See the inside view of the most important capabilities and hear predictions on the developments that will be most applicable in our industry.

video:video.video:title: Reinventing enterprise defense with the Elastic Stack - EON North America 2021
video:video.video:description: In 2020 Uber's security team landed on a search and discovery platform heavily dependent on the Elastic Stack. While the security engineering challenges Uber faces on a day-to-day basis span far and wide, they're certainly not all unique to Uber — from correlating behaviors across data sources to building interfaces for examining security logs and crafting detection logic to surface malicious behaviors, to name a few. Hear the most impactful lessons learned from Uber's security journey, and how security practitioners everywhere can tackle pervasive enterprise security challenges using the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: Faster business decisions and collaboration with Elastic Workplace Search - EON North America 2021
video:video.video:description: With a dizzying array of productivity and collaboration tools available on the market, learning how to maximize their usefulness — and your investment in them — is paramount. A unified search experience across all those sources of content ensures that your teams consistently see and share the right docs and data. See how less time spent searching means more time spent strategizing.

video:video.video:title: Automate threat detections and avoid false positives - EON Security Latin America 2021
video:video.video:description: Eliminar puntos ciegos significa que ahora tendras suficiente contexto. ¿Pero podras obtener información importante de ese contexto cuando la necesites? Conoce cómo detectar amenazas (y evitar la interferencia de los falsos positivos) con el motor de detección en Elastic Security. Verás cómo automatizar la detección de amenazas a través de correlaciones y Machine Learning, con ejemplos del mundo real de ambos.

video:video.video:title: Fast and effective correlation of events and threats at CODERE
video:video.video:description: CODERE es una multinacional española, con una experiencia de más de 35 años, referente en el sector del juego privado en Europa y Latinoamérica. Dentro del proceso de transformación de CODERE la ciberseguridad es clave, siendo uno de los pilares la visibilidad de la información, así como la rápida y efectiva correlación de los eventos y el hunting de amenazas. Elastic Security ha ofrecido una versatilidad y rendimiento excepcional para manejar estos volúmenes de información y es el primer paso de un proyecto ambicioso de creación de un datalake para prevención del fraude, ciberseguridad y la monitorización inteligente de la red e infraestructura.

video:video.video:title: Advanced Threat Monitoring using Elastic
video:video.video:description: Conozca el caso de estudio de Digiware donde conoceremos el reto de hacer una gestión de monitoreo avanzado de amenazas de ciberseguridad, con el fin de identificar eventos relevantes de ataque y utilizando algunos motores de Machine Learning para dicho efecto, todo procesado con la tecnología de Elastic. Así mismo, el proceso de migración de una plataforma SIEM a Elastic e integrado a los demás componentes de operación de un SOC usando mecanismos de MDR.

video:video.video:title: Operationalize with alerting, custom dashboards, and timelines - EON Security Latin America 2021
video:video.video:description: Ajusta tus procesos de respuesta ante incidentes monitoreando la falta de cumplimiento, alertando sobre actividad atípica y personalizando exploraciones para automatizar las acciones de respuesta. Ve cómo Elastic le brinda a tu equipo de seguridad las visualizaciones y flujos de trabajo personalizados que necesitas para mejorar la eficiencia, optimizar la colaboración y poner realmente en funcionamiento la información de seguridad.

video:video.video:title: Get full visibility and find hidden security issues - EON Security Latin America 2021
video:video.video:description: Cuando incluso las amenazas básicas pueden tener varias etapas y ser complejas, la visibilidad limitada de los datos de seguridad no será suficiente. Ya sea que estes realizando investigaciones o buscando amenazas, necesitaras todo el contexto relevante para la seguridad. Aprende prácticas clave de recopilación y normalización de datos y ve cómo puedes usar Elastic Security para priorizar, verificar e incluir problemas con rapidez y precisión.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Security evolution and vision - EON Security Latin America 2021
video:video.video:description: Los equipos de SecOps asumen más responsabilidad que nunca para aumentar actividad desde una fuerza de trabajo recientemente remota, lo que acelera la necesidad de la transformación digital. Conoce cómo evolucionó Elastic Security para ayudar a los equipos de SecOps tomar un enfoque más amplio e inclusivo en base a la seguridad y preparar a sus organizaciones para el éxito. Además, conoce la visión de lo que vendrá.

video:video.video:title: CYBERSOC’s holistic approach to cybersecurity
video:video.video:description: Tener la posibilidad de centralizar el análisis y correlacionamiento de datos, la gestión de la seguridad de la información, la auditoria y monitoreo de políticas, la cacería e inteligencia de amenazas y el cumplimiento normativo soportado por un enfoque de bigdata de ciberseguridad que potencializa el análisis de los casos de uso de máquinas de aprendizaje e inteligencia de agentes, nos ha permitido prevenir, detectar y responder ante las amenazas cibernéticas más letales y recientes.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Security evolution and vision - EON Security Spain 2021
video:video.video:description: Los equipos de SecOps asumen ahora más responsabilidades que nunca, ya que la actividad en línea aumenta a raíz  de una nueva fuerza de trabajo remota, lo que acelera la necesidad de transformación digital. Descubre cómo Elastic Security ha evolucionado para ayudar a los equipos de SecOps a adoptar un enfoque de seguridad más amplio e inclusivo y preparar a sus organizaciones para el éxito. Además, escucha la visión de lo que sigue.

video:video.video:title: Get full visibility and find hidden security issues - EON Security Spain 2021
video:video.video:description: Aun las amenazas básicas pueden ser múltiples y complejas, y la visibilidad limitada de tus datos de seguridad simplemente no es suficiente. Ya sea que realices investigaciones o busques amenazas, necesitas todo el contexto relevante para la seguridad. Aprende las prácticas clave en la recopilación y normalización de datos y ve cómo puedes usar Elastic Security para clasificar, verificar y abordar problemas de forma rápida y precisa.

video:video.video:title: Live-Interview mit Audi (DE)
video:video.video:description: Wie Audi Elasticsearch in deren Suchprojekt "Share42tomorrow" einsetzt, um damit Millionen von Dokumenten zu prozessieren und durchsuchen.

video:video.video:title: Monitoring modern applications using Elastic
video:video.video:description: Explore how Elastic can help you monitor and troubleshoot your applications in real time. Learn how to leverage the Elastic Stack to monitor multiple deployments and resolve challenges in your environment. After the session, you'll have access to a hands-on lab environment to practice these skills.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stack keynote
video:video.video:description: Elastic solutions are built on the Elastic Stack (Elasticsearch, Kibana, Logstash, and Beats). The power of building on a single stack is that every innovation delivered on the Elastic Stack benefits all Elastic solutions. And the more you do on the Elastic Stack, the more value you get out of your investment. Hear about the key focus areas for development in Elasticsearch and Kibana, what we have delivered recently, and where we are headed.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Security keynote
video:video.video:description: Openness is important at Elastic — we code in the open, communicate directly with our users, and offer free, powerful software that can be deployed across major cloud providers or through self-managed downloads. Learn how Elastic Security delivers on our free and open philosophy to help SecOps teams take a broader, more inclusive approach to security and set their organizations up for success.

video:video.video:title: Empowering agencies using Elastic as a Service inside Government - EON Public Sector US Federal
video:video.video:description: It has now been four years since the beta release of Elastic Cloud Enterprise which kicked off a wave of the Elastic public sector community running Elastic as a service within Government rather than utilizing purely hosted solutions. Fast forward to 2021 and we have multiple options for multiple mission needs. Learn top tips from Elastic architects and their experience enabling their teams with the automation and provisioning of Elastic tech to change the game in how government delivers solutions.

video:video.video:title: Using machine learning to detect DGA with >99.9% accuracy
video:video.video:description: Accurately detect domain generation algorithm (DGA) activity using the Elastic Stack by deploying a pre-trained supervised machine learning model to enrich Packetbeat data at ingest and anomaly detection to improve accuracy and pinpoint malicious hosts. We will walk through the configuration and then deep dive into what each component is doing, how the model was trained, and how the model can detect real-world malware activity.

video:video.video:title: How we built this: Data tiering, snapshots, and asynchronous search
video:video.video:description: What goes into a major roadmap investment at Elastic? Take a closer look at the technical capabilities that come together to help us deliver on our data tier vision — from asynchronous search to searchable S3/blob store/Google storage, new cold and frozen storage tiers, and more.

video:video.video:title: Replacing Legacy Product Search with Elasticsearch at IEEE GlobalSpec
video:video.video:description: In 2017, IEEE GlobalSpec replaced their legacy product search with an Elasticsearch cluster. Starting with an index of approximately 20 million product documents and an eye toward scaling, the team leveraged built-in Elasticsearch functionalities to solve their unique search challenges. Today their backend environment consists of seven Elasticsearch nodes with a gateway service sitting in the front to analyze user requests and add business logic.Learn why IEEE GlobalSpec chose Elasticsearch, see the topology of their cluster, and learn how they're combining aggregations to solve diversification issues and searching across vastly different types of reference content to deliver the very best results at search time.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch for .NET Developers: A Whirlwind Dive into the Strongly-Typed Client for .NET
video:video.video:description:
Elasticsearch for .NET Developers: A whirlwind dive into the strongly-typed client for .NET Elasticsearch offers a simple REST interface that exposes JSON, so a .NET developer might be tempted to simply use HttpClient and Json.NET to talk with Elasticsearch.
In this talk we'll showcase some of the features that outline how NEST plays to C# strengths and helps you write terser code, all just one line of code away: new ElasticClient(). A few of the topics that we'll cover:
- Strongly-typed requests and responses
- Inference
- Query DSL
- Aggregations- Covariant result sets
- Connection pooling and failover
Attendees will leave this talk knowing how to fully tame Elasticsearch from .NET

video:video.video:title: Safehouse: Monitoring and anomaly detection with smart sensors for safe environments - EON Observability Europe 2021
video:video.video:description: Safehouse IoT smart sensors are designed to improve the health and well being of individuals who wish to live independently in their own homes through later life. To enhance the affordability of their solution with its rapidly growing data set and implement fast data extraction tools, Safehouse turned to Mobilise Cloud based on the ELK stack to integrate into their award-winning flagship VIPER product. With extremely low latency, they can now monitor large volumes of environmental data captured on a millisecond by millisecond basis over extended periods — providing a critical, often life-saving service to their users.

video:video.video:title: Operationalizing Elastic Security for practitioners
video:video.video:description: Fine-tune your incident response processes by monitoring non-compliance, alerting on outlier activity, and customizing drilldowns to automate response actions. See how Elastic gives your security team the customized visualizations and workflows you need to improve efficiency, streamline collaboration, and truly operationalize your security insights.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Security under the hood
video:video.video:description: Elastic Security, powered by one of the biggest engineering groups inside Elastic today, is operationalizing the speed, scale, and relevance of the Elastic Stack for security use cases. Get an inside look into how Elastic Security works under the hood so you can learn how to make the most of the Elastic Stack for security. We’ll cover the main technical decisions for the detection engine, our endpoint protection, Fleet, data ingestion, and more.

video:video.video:title: Cost-effective data storage with data tiers
video:video.video:description: From data lifecycle management to hot-warm-cold-frozen data tiers, learn how to manage data in Elastic. We’ll provide best practices and examples to help you leave with an understanding of how to optimize Elastic Stack to meet your specific needs across cost, performance, and data duration.

video:video.video:title: SIEM, malware protection, deep data visibility — for free
video:video.video:description: Are you a SIEM user who needs endpoint detection and correlation for complex multi-stage attacks across your environment? Elastic has launched a free and open endpoint security offering, directly integrated into the Elastic Stack. This offering is part of the free distribution tier and is available to every Elastic user. Learn how Elastic Security can help you protect your environment and why this advancement is so significant to security visibility.

video:video.video:title: Saving money with Elastic
video:video.video:description: Does your technology spending keep you up at night? Are you looking for ways to save money? Learn best practices for saving money with Elastic. We will answer questions such as: When does it make sense to commit to an annual contract, and how much will I save? How can I manage shards and snapshots to decrease storage spending? You will leave this session with prescriptive guidance you can immediately apply to optimize your Elastic spending.

video:video.video:title: Nativo ELK to Elastic Stack: A Production Journey of 3+ Years
video:video.video:description: In 2014, the small engineering team at Nativo had zero visibility into system performance and inadequate monitoring in place. Today, the Elastic Stack is a mission-critical system at Nativo, ingesting data from more than 30 applications, generating 150 million documents, and consuming 225 GB each day across four Amazon Web Services regions.Hear how the team and their implementation of the Elastic Stack evolved over the past three years. Learn best practices — such as enriching logs before leaving the instance and standardizing applications logs as JSON — that have contributed to the team's success. Plus, see how they're addressing new challenges like improving index management.

video:video.video:title: Enterprise search and unstructured data with CGI and Elastic - EON Public Sector Europe
video:video.video:description: Hear how CGI and Elastic are partnering to deliver search and analytics solutions for government organisations.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stack: Using data for insight and action - EON North America 2021
video:video.video:description: Learn about the latest innovations for managing data storage costs while balancing performance with Elasticsearch. See how to use new visualization and alerting capabilities to turn data insights into decisive action.

video:video.video:title: Observability at scale: Hear from the Elastic Cloud SRE team
video:video.video:description: 3 Cloud Providers. 38 Global Regions. 1,000+ VMs. 100,000s of containers. That's just part of the scope of Elastic's planetary-scale cloud offering. Hear how the Elastic Cloud SRE team uses Elastic Observability to get the full picture of the health and performance of our SaaS platform, complete with a real-life use case.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Observability keynote
video:video.video:description: Elastic Observability is helping organizations drive their mean time to resolution toward zero with end-to-end visibility in a single platform. Hear about the latest features and capabilities at all layers — from ingest to insight — and get a glimpse into where we are headed.

video:video.video:title: Combining logs, metrics, and traces for unified observability - EON North America 2021
video:video.video:description: Learn how Elasticsearch efficiently combines data in a single store and how Kibana is used to analyze it. Plus, see how recent developments help identify, troubleshoot, and resolve operational issues faster.

video:video.video:title: What's new at Elastic: Update on major initiatives and releases - EON Public Sector Europe
video:video.video:description: The first technical talk of the event will highlight the latest releases at Elastic with specific insight into how those changes impact public sector projects. See the inside view of the most important capabilities and hear predictions on the developments that will be most applicable in our industry.

video:video.video:title: Advanced tips for visualizing and presenting data in Kibana
video:video.video:description: Data analysis is rarely a linear start-to-finish process — no matter how much we wish it was. Good data analysis always prompts additional questions. Supporting the questions-and-answers cycle is something Kibana was built to do. Learn protips for how to use Kibana’s latest capabilities to rapidly move from data questions to beautifully formatted answers in the form of dashboards and interactive reports in Canvas.

video:video.video:title: Thomson Reuters, Research, Journalism, Finance, & Elastic
video:video.video:description: From log analysis to ensure systems are functioning, to a search platform for insight into financial trends and journalism assets – the Elastic Stack is an integral part of Thomson Reuters. Learn about how they customize it to fit their needs through tooling, custom plugins, predictive monitoring, and more.

video:video.video:title: Searching anything, anywhere with Workplace Search
video:video.video:description: Struggling to find that one document on your FTP server? Forgot where you saved your draft slide deck? Learn how to use the Custom Source API in Elastic Workplace Search to index your content. See how to use Workplace Search's flexible schemas, configurable display preferences, and access controls when paired with the community FSCrawler project to help find everything in your filesystem.

video:video.video:title: Grab: Building a Healthy Elasticsearch Ecosystem
video:video.video:description: Grab began developing with Elasticsearch to help arrange team user access privileges. Discover how, through trial and error, Grab was able to go further to build a flexible and scalable Elasticsearch ecosystem.

video:video.video:title: From Data to Action with TV 2
video:video.video:description: TV 2 is one of the largest streaming service in Norway. They’re working toward a more consumer-centric approach in order to enhance the product and customer experience. Learn how they have built both a customer-focused company culture and an analytics platform using the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: Customer Success @ Elastic: Elastic Stack + Salesforce = <3
video:video.video:description: Come and see the folks behind the Elastic curtain, and we'll show you how Elastic uses the Elastic Stack to enhance our internal technology stack. A.J., Kristina, and Pius will discuss Elastic's Customer Success programs, showing you start to finish how they query and expose license data, how they use the Elastic Stack to enhance the Support Engineers’ experience in their support console, and how they bring all that information together in Salesforce to provide a predictive and holistic system for customer health.

video:video.video:title: Elastic APM: Amping up your logs and metrics for the full picture - EON Observability Europe 2021
video:video.video:description: No matter where you are in your journey to cloud native, Elastic APM can help you deliver better customer experiences by spotting performance bottlenecks sooner and identifying regressions from new deployments faster. Learn how to get a complete view of the services that power your applications — from frontend to backend — to keep them running smoothly.

video:video.video:title: The best way to run Elastic on Kubernetes
video:video.video:description: Elastic Cloud on Kubernetes (ECK) automates the deployment and orchestration of the Elastic Stack on Kubernetes. Learn about the available options for underlying storage and the tradeoffs between local disks and network-attached volumes.

video:video.video:title: Deploy the Elastic stack on Kubernetes with ECK
video:video.video:description: Découvrons comment Elastic Cloud on Kubernetes (ECK) s'appuie sur le concept d'operator Kubernetes pour orchestrer Elasticsearch, Kibana et APM Server sur Kubernetes.Au programme:Démo et tour d'horizon des fonctionnalités d'ECK Nouveautés de la version 1.1 Y'a quoi dans le moteur ? Fonctionnement d'un operator K8s Orchestration d'applications "stateful" Fonctionnalités avancées Enregistrement réalisé lors du Meetup ElasticFR Paris #49 virtuel.

video:video.video:title: Starting an observability journey at ING
video:video.video:description: La industria bancaria se enfrenta a un gran desafío: evolucionar su tecnología al ritmo de las big tech. En ING han decidido afrontar este reto usando Elastic Stack. Únete a Ignacio Suarez, Spain country manager en Elastic y a Marcos Peñate, DevOps Engineer en ING, para entender cómo ING ha mejorado su fiabilidad y su disponibilidad con Elastic.

video:video.video:title: Using a risk based approach to provide cost-effective security - EON Public Sector US State & Federal
video:video.video:description: The State of Arizona Enterprise Security team undertook a proof of concept to increase the automation and reporting capabilities of its risk assessment and threat intelligence process. The goal is to analyze large amounts of data using Elastic to produce more accurate risk assessments with prevention, detection, response capabilities, and accurately model the cybersecurity threats the state is facing. This enables the State of Arizona to validate its security posture, be agile to continuously improve and respond to evolving cyber threats, and improve the cost effectiveness of security tools.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Looping through data, insight, and action - EON Public Sector US Federal
video:video.video:description: General Manager of Elastic Security Solutions Nate Fick explains how Elastic is helping mission-oriented organizations stay agile by allowing users to do more with their data — more affordably and faster than ever before.

video:video.video:title: Tales from a security specialist at Salt Lake County - EON Public Sector US State & Federal
video:video.video:description: Jared Pane interviews Chris Adamson, Information Security Engineer with Salt Lake County, about how he uses Elastic to protect his IT.

video:video.video:title: What’s new with data visualization in Kibana
video:video.video:description: Exploring and visualizing semistructured data like logs, metrics, and APM traces in Kibana is as easy as clicking and dragging your mouse. Get a rapid primer on how to approach Kibana for data analytics and hear about updates designed to help you move from data discovery to decision at light speed.

video:video.video:title: How to become an Elastic contributor
video:video.video:description: Learn how to start contributing to Elastic projects, including the popular Elastic UI Framework (EUI) — the foundation of all Elastic UIs. We’ll dive into licensing, contributor agreements, useful tips around Git, and feature proposals. You’ll also get an overview of the setup, builds, and testing in EUI.

video:video.video:title: Orange Business Services: Better SIEM infrastructure with Elastic
video:video.video:description: Découvrez comment Orange Business Services utilise la Suite Elastic pour refondre et moderniser leur infrastructure SIEM et améliorer davantage leurs méthodes de détection d’anomalies et d’intrusions.

video:video.video:title: How eStruxture Data Centers is Using ECE to Rapidly Scale Their Business
video:video.video:description: Machines do the boring, repetitive tasks and humans solve the problems is the motto behind eStruxture’s next generation monitoring solution. ECE has been the key component behind the rapid scaling of eStruxture’s business. Eric Charpentier will share how Elastic is helping eStruxture unify millions of divergent data points and transforming them into human readable and actionable items. See how eStruxture Data Centers are able to build a new model for alarming and alerting using diverse pipelines for multiple types of equipment, and how they provide their teams with the data they need to solve problems.

video:video.video:title: Getting Your Data Graph-Ready
video:video.video:description: Knowing what sort of data makes sense to put in Graph and how to prepare it is often a challenge for new users. This session will walk through examples of how to model your data in order to start exploring the interesting connections it contains. Learn about models for “wisdom of crowd” style applications and configurations to support “forensic” style investigations.

video:video.video:title: Autoscaling: From zero to production seamlessly
video:video.video:description: Have you ever wanted to seamlessly scale up and down the size of your Elastic deployment? Autoscaling is coming to Elastic. Learn how this upcoming feature will help simplify the management of your deployments and how you can automatically scale up and down as demand increases or decreases. We’ll describe how Elasticsearch determines when it is time to scale up or down, and how that information is communicated through the platform.

video:video.video:title: What’s Cooking in Kibana? (2016)
video:video.video:description: Elastic's Rashid Khan and Chris Cowan present all the news you need to know about Kibana at Elastic{ON}16 on February 17, 2016, in San Francisco.

video:video.video:title: Automate threat detections and avoid false positives - EON Security Spain 2021
video:video.video:description: Eliminar los puntos ciegos significa que tienes suficiente contexto. ¿Pero puedes obtener información importante de ese contexto cuando lo necesitas? Aprende a detectar amenazas, mientras evitas el ruido de falsos positivos, con el motor de detección de Elastic Security. Verás cómo automatizar la detección de amenazas mediante correlaciones y Machine Learning, con ejemplos reales de cada uno.

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ H-E-B: Providing a better shopping experience at Central Market
video:video.video:description: The H-E-B grocery chain has grown from a store to so much more, including the Central Market specialty food stores, where Elasticsearch has played a key role in the development of search across their extensive product catalog. Learn how H-E-B uses Elasticsearch to power several applications for Central Market, across their omnichannel experience, to provide a faster, more relevant search experience for customers. Plus, see how they’re using the Elastic Stack to better understand customer behavior and buying patterns to drive more revenue, personalize merchandising real-time, and create a better user experience.

video:video.video:title: Explore relève les défis Big Data avec Elastic Cloud - EON Solution Series: EMEA
video:video.video:description: Spécialisée dans le développement et la gestion de solutions de veille documentaire et commerciale, Explore offre à ses clients une lecture précise et organisée de l’actualités des marchés et projets sur leurs territoires d'intervention. Afin de rendre leur offre plus agile et performante, Explore a choisi l’offre Elastic Cloud hébergée sur Microsoft Azure. Découvrez comment les équipes de production et de développement sont désormais en mesure de mieux exploiter les données pour les clients d’Explore et gagnent du temps sur la gestion de leur infrastructure.

video:video.video:title: Yves Rocher - garder un oeil sur les points de vente et détecter les anomalies avec Elastic - EON Solution Series: EMEA
video:video.video:description: Au cours de cette session, Yves Rocher expliquera comment la solution Elastic Observability est utilisée pour surveiller les points de vente et détecter les anomalies dans leur système.

video:video.video:title: Moving from On-Prem to Managed Services with Elastic on Azure
video:video.video:description:
Dans ce webinar, vous apprendrez tout ce qu'il y a à savoir pour vous lancer avec Elastic Cloud (le service géré d'Elasticsearch) sur Microsoft Azure. Découvrez comment déployer et gérer des clusters Elasticsearch, migrer d'un cluster sur site vers Azure, et utiliser votre déploiement pour monitorer les services Azure avec des intégrations prêtes à l'emploi.
Voici les sujets qui seront abordés :
Configurer un cluster sur site, l'hydrater avec un ensemble de données de vol et prendre des snapshots Déployer dans Azure Restaurer un snapshot stocké Vérifier que votre migration a réussi
Autres ressources :
Découvrez pourquoi et comment Miles & More a migré vers Elastic Cloud sur Microsoft Azure Lancez-vous avec Elastic Cloud sur Microsoft Azure Apprenez à créer un déploiement à l'aide de votre compte Azure existant
Veuillez noter que cette présentation est en Anglais.

video:video.video:title: Aldara: Powering social network with Elastic Cloud - Spain 3+1 2020
video:video.video:description: Conoce a Aldara, una herramienta inteligente para redes sociales desarrollada por la filial de ciberseguridad de Telefonica, ElevenPaths. Descubre como ElevenPaths usa el servicio Elasticsearch en Elastic Cloud para llevar a cabo análisis de conversaciones complejas, evaluar riesgos de crisis y ataques relativos a la reputación, identificar a las personas más influyentes en las redes y realizar estudios de mercado.

video:video.video:title: Visibility against cybercrime - Spain 3+1 2020
video:video.video:description: La seguridad de una empresa está determinada por la velocidad con la que obtiene y procesa los datos que afectan a sus competencias clave del negocio. En esta charla, GMV, empresa líder en ciberseguridad, presenta un caso de uso de la tecnología Elastic para reducir de horas a segundos los tiempos de búsqueda, impactando directamente en la seguridad de los entornos críticos.

video:video.video:title: Operationalize with alerting, custom dashboards, and timelines (FR)
video:video.video:description: Optimisez vos processus de réponse aux incidents en monitorant les non-conformités, en créant des alertes sur les activités anormales et en personnalisant l'exploration pour automatiser les actions de réponse. Avec Elastic, votre équipe de sécurité bénéficie des visualisations personnalisées et des workflows dont elle a besoin pour gagner en efficacité, rationaliser la collaboration et rendre vos perspectives de sécurité véritablement opérationnelles.

video:video.video:title: Automate threat detections and avoid false positives (FR)
video:video.video:description: En éliminant les angles morts, vous disposez à présent d'un contexte suffisant. Mais cela signifie-t-il pour autant que vous pouvez tirer des informations importantes quand vous en avez besoin ? Découvrez comment détecter les menaces, tout en évitant les faux positifs, avec le moteur de détection d'Elastic Security. Vous apprendrez à automatiser la détection des menaces en exploitant les corrélations et le Machine Learning à l'aide d'exemples réels.

video:video.video:title: Get full visibility and find hidden security issues (FR)
video:video.video:description: Même les menaces basiques peuvent s'avérer complexes avec plusieurs niveaux. Pour y faire face, vous devez avoir une visibilité non limitée sur vos données. Que vous enquêtiez sur des menaces ou que vous les traquiez, vous devez avoir à votre disposition l'ensemble du contexte relatif à la sécurité. Découvrez des bonnes pratiques de collecte et de normalisation des données, et apprenez à utiliser Elastic Security pour trier, vérifier et classer les problèmes avec rapidité et précision.

video:video.video:title: Credit Agricole: Powering banking apps with the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Crédit Agricole Corporate & Investment Bank  utilise la Suite Elastic pour leurs équipes de banque de financement et d'investissement. Découvrez comment la Suite est utilisée pour venir en support à la stratégie de Market Risk management et de Cash Management.

video:video.video:title: Advanced Operation with Elastic Stack at NTT Communications
video:video.video:description: NTTコミュニケーションズでは保守運用担当者が手動で長時間かけ行っていた設備の状況調査等の処理をElastic Stackを用い瞬時に行えるようにすることで手動処理の稼働を減らし、コスト削減につなげています。複数案件ある中から一例をご紹介いたします。

video:video.video:title: How M4U uses Elastic Cloud to monitor a platform with 180 million transactions per month
video:video.video:description: Nessa apresentação você verá como a equipe de recargas da M4U saiu de 3 monólitos para dezenas de microsserviços e migraram todos seus logs de uma solução Elastic on premise para o Elastic Cloud. Além disso, será demonstrado como eles organizaram seus logs, volumetria de eventos e as métricas e alarmes que são geradas à partir deles.

video:video.video:title: Operationalize with alerting, custom dashboards, and timelines - EON Security Spain 2021
video:video.video:description: Afina tus procesos de respuesta a incidentes mediante el monitoreo del incumplimiento al alertar sobre actividades atípicas y personalizar desgloses para automatizar las acciones de respuesta. Ve cómo Elastic le brinda a tu equipo de seguridad visualizaciones personalizadas y flujos de trabajo que necesitas para mejorar la eficiencia, agilizar la colaboración y realmente poner en funcionamiento tus conocimientos de seguridad.

video:video.video:title: Get involved with the security community at Elastic
video:video.video:description: Explore ways to engage with your local (or virtual) Elastic security community — virtual meetups, hosted and organized events, Slack, forums, and more. Whether you want to showcase your project, learn from others, hear expert opinions and guidance, or simply get connected, we can help. We'll share the latest and greatest in community efforts, including our new community rules repo, EQL, ECS, and more!

video:video.video:title: Elastic Enterprise Search keynote
video:video.video:description: To kick off a day packed with informative sessions, we’ll take a look back at all the leaps forward for Elastic Enterprise Search in 2020. Then get a sneak peek at what the future holds for our search roadmap.

video:video.video:title: Getting help from the Elastic community
video:video.video:description: We've all been stuck — and the Elastic community is an invaluable resource for getting back on track. Learn how to make the most of the community and how to help others. We'll cover where you can go to get help, how to ask better questions and make it easier to get an answer, and what to expect from the community.

video:video.video:title: Twenty years of Apache Lucene
video:video.video:description: After beginning to develop Lucene in 1998, Doug Cutting released a first version on Sourceforge more than 20 years ago in April 2000. Come learn more about the story of Apache Lucene and find out how it went from a single-person project on Sourceforge to one of the most successful projects of the Apache Software Foundation that powers most of the world's search engines.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Security evolution and vision (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: Saiba como o Elastic Security evoluiu para ajudar as equipes de operações de segurança a adotar uma abordagem mais ampla e inclusiva à segurança e preparar sua organização para o sucesso.

video:video.video:title: Operationalize with alerting, custom dashboards, and timelines (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: Veja como a Elastic fornece à sua equipe de segurança visualizações customizadas e os fluxos de trabalho necessários para melhorar a eficiência, otimizar a colaboração e operacionalizar verdadeiramente seus insights de segurança.

video:video.video:title: Building a centralized observability platform (ES)
video:video.video:description: El éxito de las iniciativas de observabilidad suele depender de los equipos de plataforma que definen, estandarizan y regulan las herramientas y marcos de trabajo centralizados. Descubre la forma en la que Elastic Observability impulsa a estos equipos con características como la gestión centralizada para los agentes, la categorización de logs automatizada (basada en Machine Learning), gestión de ciclo de vida y los snapshot buscables. Juntos, podemos ayudarte a crear centros de excelencia y a ofrecer la observabilidad como servicio a los agentes internos.

video:video.video:title: Civir: Observability solutions with Elastic as a service
video:video.video:description: La automatización en el despliegue de soluciones de Observabilidad, es la clave para disponer de una infraestructura capaz de responder, con rapidez, a las diferentes necesidades de los clientes. Aprenda cómo Civir usa Elastic para integrar todo tipo de fuentes y proporcionar una visión completa, no solo de los sistemas, también de los datos de negocio. Vea cómo el stack de Elastic ayuda a resolver los requerimientos demandados en los entornos más críticos.

video:video.video:title: Infrastructure monitoring made easy, from ingest to insight (Latin America)
video:video.video:description: Descubre como simplificar los datos con integraciones preconstruidas, insumos automatizados con alertamiento y machine learning y además herramientas de visualización para el caso de uso de monitoreo.

video:video.video:title: Elastic APM: Amping up your logs and metrics for the full picture (Latin America)
video:video.video:description: No importa dónde se encuentre en su viaje a la nube nativa, Elastic APM ayuda a ofrecer mejores experiencias al cliente al detectar los cuellos de botella en el rendimiento e identificar más rápidamente las regresiones de las nuevas implementaciones.

video:video.video:title: Building a centralized observability platform (Latin America)
video:video.video:description: Vea cómo Elastic Observability permite a los equipos encargados de la plataforma crear centros de excelencia con características como la gestión central de agentes, la gestión del ciclo de vida de los índices y snapshots buscables.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Security evolution and vision (JP)
video:video.video:description: 進化を遂げたElasticセキュリティは、広範で包括的なセキュリティアプローチで成功に向かう組織を支援します。

video:video.video:title: Innovating at speed and scale with implicit security
video:video.video:description: Growth depends on continuous innovation with emerging technology at speed and scale. How can you do it securely? And why is the timing so vital, as businesses emerge from economic uncertainty?

video:video.video:title: Large-Scale Threat Intelligence Platform Use Case & Elastic Security Case Study (JP)
video:video.video:description: ラックのセキュリティ監視センターであるJSOCでは、お客様である企業や組織のネットワークを24時間体制で監視し、サイバー攻撃などの脅威に対応しています。日々新たな攻撃が行われている中、新たな攻撃手法に対応するためにスレットインテリジェンス基盤にてサイバー攻撃を観測しています。スレットインテリジェンス基盤におけるElastic Stackや、Elastic Securityの活用事例をご紹介します。

video:video.video:title: Security monitoring with Elastic Cloud at Yokogawa Electric
video:video.video:description: 横河電機では、Elastic Cloudを利用して、全世界のコーポレイトネットワークのセキュリティ監視を行っています。セキュリティ監視センター（YSOC）の立ち上げから、ログ・イベント情報の収集、不正アクセス検知やダッシュボードの開発、さらにElasticsearch社のコンサル事例などをご紹介いたします。

video:video.video:title: Operationalize with alerting, custom dashboards, and timelines (JP)
video:video.video:description: Elasticのテクノロジーを活用して可視化やワークフローのカスタマイズでチームの作業効率を向上させ、共同作業を合理化し、セキュリティインサイトの真の運用を実現する手法を解説します。

video:video.video:title: Automate threat detections and avoid false positives (JP)
video:video.video:description: Elasticセキュリティの検知エンジンを使うと、誤検知のノイズを回避しながら脅威を検知できます。また、実際の事例を交えながら、相関付けと機械学習で脅威検知を自動化する手法をご紹介します。

video:video.video:title: Elastic Security: Enterprise Protection Built on the Elastic Stack - Spain 3+1 2020
video:video.video:description: Elastic Security ofrece prevención de amenazas para datos globales, así como características de prevención, recopilación, detección y respuesta. Descubre cómo marcar la diferencia frente a la competencia mediante el uso de tecnología multinivel, examina demostraciones en directo y resuelve tus dudas.

video:video.video:title: Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability - Spain 3+1 2020
video:video.video:description: Descubre cómo Elasticsearch combina de forma eficiente los datos en un solo almacén y cómo los analiza Kibana. Además, podrás comprobar la forma en la que los desarrollos más recientes facilitan la tarea de identificación, solución de problemas y resolución de incidencias operativas con mayor rapidez.

video:video.video:title: Search for All with Elastic Workplace Search - Spain 3+1 2020
video:video.video:description: Descubre cómo reinventamos la búsqueda en el trabajo para acceder rápidamente a la información con una búsqueda unificada, conectores de datos instantáneos e interfaces de gestión de búsquedas sencillas.

video:video.video:title: Free and open cloud security posture monitoring
video:video.video:description: As organizations migrate to the cloud, attackers have diversified to operate in cloud environments. Learn about the challenges faced by security teams in the cloud and why attacks against cloud environments often succeed. We’ll demonstrate how to ship event data from platforms like AWS, Okta, and Azure to the Elastic Stack, and how security teams can monitor attacker behavior using Elastic Security and Elastic’s free and open detection rules.

video:video.video:title: Using Elastic @ Elastic: InfoSec and Elastic Security
video:video.video:description: Learn how the Elastic InfoSec team is using Elastic Cloud to further enhance the Elastic Security solution. We'll show off how we use telemetry data to help with model development for data scientists, provide feedback for security analysts, enable support engineers, and more!

video:video.video:title: Breaking silos between DevOps and SecOps with Elastic
video:video.video:description: What is better: 99.999% uptime, continuous delivery, or a secure environment? Yeah, we had the same reaction: "Why do I need to pick one?" With Elastic, your operations and security teams can work together on a single platform, and help drive mean time to detect/resolve to zero for both operational and security issues. Hear how we are helping customers break down artificial silos between teams and use cases, and move towards a DevSecOps culture.

video:video.video:title: The Elastic clients: Recent developments
video:video.video:description: The clients for Elasticsearch and Elastic Workplace Search are the front door to Elastic for many developers. Get up to speed with recent developments, including Workplace Search and App Search in one Elastic Enterprise Search umbrella client, plus a continuous stream of improvements in the Elasticsearch clients for JavaScript, Go, and Perl. We’ll also cover some best practices like cluster sniffing and using API keys and client helpers.

video:video.video:title: From secure VPC links to SSO with Elastic Cloud
video:video.video:description: Have you ever wondered how you can use the technologies built into Elastic Cloud to improve your deployment's security posture? Learn about security best practices for built-in security features such as encryption by default for data in transit or at rest, and also the tools you can use to enhance security such as IP filtering and our AWS PrivateLink integration.

video:video.video:title: Automate threat detections and avoid false positives (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: Detecte ameaças e evite falsos positivos com o mecanismo de detecção no Elastic Security. Automatize a detecção de ameaças por meio de correlações e machine learning com exemplos do reais.

video:video.video:title: Incident management with Elastic SIEM (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: A Eleven Paths, uma companhia da Telefônica, falará sobre o projeto de gestão de incidente de segurança da informação com o Elastic SIEM. Esse projeto se baseia nos pilares de preparação, detecção, triagem e priorização, análise, contenção, erradicação, recuperação e pós-incidente; E tem como objetivo restaurar a operação rapidamente quando algum incidente ocorre, garantindo assim o melhor nível de serviço e disponibilidade aos seus clientes.

video:video.video:title: Get full visibility and find hidden security issues (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: Conheça as principais práticas de coleta e normalização de dados para expandir a visibilidade no seu ambiente. Veja como você pode usar o Elastic Security para triagem, verificação e escopo de problemas com rapidez e precisão.

video:video.video:title: Elastic APM: Amping up your logs and metrics for the full picture (ES)
video:video.video:description: Las aplicaciones suelen ser la interfaz de cliente principal en las organizaciones modernas, lo que tiene un impacto directo sobre resultados como los ingresos y pérdidas de clientes. Elastic APM puede ayudarte a ofrecer mejores prácticas mediante la rápida detección de los cuellos de botella en materia de rendimiento y de las regresiones en los nuevos despliegues . Descubre cómo obtener una visión completa sobre los servicios en los que se basan tus aplicaciones, del frontend al backend, para optimizar su rendimiento.

video:video.video:title: Infrastructure monitoring made easy, from ingest to insight (ES)
video:video.video:description: La visibilidad sobre la infraestructura es un elemento esencial, independientemente de que sea en tus propias máquinas o en la nube, virtualizada, en contenedores, o en un entorno híbrido. El Elastic (ELK) Stack, históricamente conocido por sus capacidades de logging, permite también monitorear tus métricas con el mismo rendimiento Descubre cómo facilitamos la ingesta de datos mediante cientos de integraciones prediseñadas, mejoramos tu día a día con alertas y machine learning, y mejoramos tus visualizaciones con nuevas herramientas desarrolladas para los casos de uso de monitoreo.

video:video.video:title: Tenedis: Office 365 observability with Elastic
video:video.video:description: L’adoption d’office 365 par les entreprises ne cesse de s’accélérer. Mais l’adoption des utilisateurs ne peut être un succès que si l’expérience utilisateur est à la hauteur des promesses. Les directions informatiques et métiers doivent sans cesse se poser la question de la qualité du service délivré à ses utilisateurs et en cas de dégradation de service, être en capacité de déterminer quel est le segment de la chaîne d’accès à la source de l’impact (LAN, WAN, CASB, INTERNET, Tenant Microsoft,…). Tenedis propose de partager un cas client de mise en place d’une météo des services Office 365 développé grâce à Elastic en consolidant de multiples source d’information.

video:video.video:title: Orange: Unifying logs, events and metrics with Elastic
video:video.video:description: Descubre como Orange se apoya en Elastic para unificar logs, eventos y métricas, maximizar la observabilidad de todos esos datos y poder actuar ágil y eficazmente de la forma más autónoma posible.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Observability evolution and vision (Latin America)
