video:video.video:description: Elastic Observability ayuda a conducir el tiempo medio de resolución hacia cero con una visibilidad de extremo a extremo en una sola plataforma. Escuche las últimas características y capacidades, y dele un vistazo al futuro.

video:video.video:title: Keynote - Spain 3+1 2020
video:video.video:description: Conoce el futuro de Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats y Logstash de la mano de los creadores de Elastic Stack, así como las nuevas características y soluciones, las opciones de despliegue y la evolución de las soluciones.

video:video.video:title: Kibana Use Case for logging in NRI’s Project Management Solutions
video:video.video:description: NRIでは、社内のプロジェクト管理ソリューションとしてのwikiツール"Confluence"やchatツールの"mattermost"などが用いられています。それら数百台の効率的な運用や障害時の迅速な原因切り分けを行うために、Kibanaを活用してログ情報を監視しています。具体的なエピソードを踏まえ、NRIのLogstash, Elasticsearch, Kibanaを用いた事例を解説します。

video:video.video:title: Elastic and Google: multi-cloud and hybrid-cloud solutions by Anthos
video:video.video:description: Elastic 同様に私達 Google Cloud もマルチクラウドおよびハイブリッド クラウドによる顧客システムのモダナイゼーションに注力しています。その中核にあたるソリューションとして Anthos を提供し、またオペレーションの観点では Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) を提唱しています。本セッションでは、Anthos と Elastic Stack のインテグレーション、そして SRE アプローチについて説明します。

video:video.video:title: Elastic APM: Amping up your logs and metrics for the full picture (Japan)
video:video.video:description: クラウドネイティブへの道のりに関係なく、Elastic APMはパフォーマンスのボトルネックを発見し、新しいデプロイメントからの回帰をより迅速に特定することで、より良いカスタマーエクスペリエンスを提供します。

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Observability evolution and vision (Japan)
video:video.video:description: Elastic Observabilityは、単一プラットフォームでのエンドツーエンド可視化により、MTTR(平均修復時間）をゼロにすることが可能になりました。最新の機能や特徴について学びましょう。

video:video.video:title: Building a centralized observability platform (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: Veja como o Elastic Observability capacita equipes de plataforma a criar centros de excelência com recursos como gerenciamento central para agentes, gerenciamento de ciclo de vida de índice e instantâneos pesquisáveis.

video:video.video:title: Elastic APM: Amping up your logs and metrics for the full picture (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: Não importa onde você esteja em sua jornada rumo à nuvem, o Elastic APM ajuda a oferecer melhores experiências ao cliente, identificando gargalos de desempenho e identificando regressões de novas implantações com mais rapidez.

video:video.video:title: Infrastructure monitoring made easy, from ingest to insight (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: Descubra como a integração simplificada de dados com integrações predefinidas, insights automatizados com alertas e aprendizado de máquina e novas ferramentas visuais estão otimizando o caso de uso de monitoramento de infraestrutura.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Observability evolution and vision (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: O caso de uso de Observability ajuda a conduzir o tempo médio de resolução a zero com visibilidade de ponta a ponta em uma única plataforma. Ouça sobre os recursos e capacidades mais recentes e tenha uma visão do futuro.

video:video.video:title: What's Evolving in Elasticsearch? (2016)
video:video.video:description: Elastic's Clinton Gormley and Simon Willnauer present breaking news and big developments for Elasticsearch at Elastic{ON} 2016 on February 17, 2016, in San Francisco.

video:video.video:title: OpenSource Connections: The Ghost in the Search Machine
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch is much more than a full-text search engine – it can be ‘taught’ to detect at-risk students, predict the weather, and find similar images at high scale. Attend this session to learn how you can turn Elasticsearch into a smart comparison powerhouse for your organization.

video:video.video:title: Get the Lay of the Lucene Land (2016)
video:video.video:description: Elastic's Adrien Grand presents all the news you need to know about Apache Lucene at Elastic{ON}16 in February 18, 2016 in San Francisco.

video:video.video:title: Resiliency in Elasticsearch and Lucene
video:video.video:description: As Elasticsearch clusters grow larger, their resilience to hardware and network failure becomes increasingly important. At Elasticsearch, we invest a LOT in making both Elasticsearch and Apache Lucene both detect and cope with increasingly complex failures.In this talk we will go through recent highlights and some of the future directions we plan to follow. We will touch all aspects of Elasticsearch, ranging from the lowest level of a single file, through network connection of a single node, and all the way up distributed failures on the cluster level. Even though the talk is about possible failures and various coping strategies, you will also learn about the inner workings of Elasticsearch - an interesting peek under the hood.

video:video.video:title: Canal Plus at the Elastic Paris Meetup in June 2016 (FR)
video:video.video:description: Meetup Elastic Paris - 22 juin 2016 David et Marc présentent l'architecture des moteurs de recommandations de Canal+ et comment Elastic aide Canal+ a améliorer l'expérience de ses clients. David DeschampsResponsable de l’équipe programme, usage et recommandation Marc Cina En charge du développement du moteur de recommandation http://www.meetup.com/fr-FR/ElasticFR/events/230864501/

video:video.video:title: Get the Lay of the Lucene Land
video:video.video:description: Despite being close to 20 years old (that’s almost 150 in dev years), the Lucene project keeps pushing limits. With origins rooted in full-text search, the scope of Lucene has expanded to drive improvements for Elasticsearch, most notably with doc values to make it a competitive engine to run analytics and multi-dimensional points to better handle structured data.Hear the stories behind the latest features in Lucene 7, learn how they impact Elasticsearch, and see what to expect in Lucene 8.

video:video.video:title: Divide & Conquer - Logging Architecture in Distributed Ecosystems with Elastic Cloud Enterprise at Otto
video:video.video:description: The Logging & Monitoring team of Otto.de is directly responsible for each aspect of the logging platform based on Elasticsearch, Kibana and Logstash. They provide an internal SaaS for about 25 development teams with Elastic Cloud Enterprise at the core of their setup. During their journey they have learned how to deal with challenges such as scaling Logstash, housekeeping for Elasticsearch and collecting usage metrics for analytics and billing. Learn how they built a scalable and resilient logging solution for their development teams on AWS, processing up to 350.000 events per second at peak times in a single Elasticsearch cluster.

video:video.video:title: Handling Exponential Growth With Elastic's Elasticsearch Service
video:video.video:description: Voxpopme are the market leader in video insight market research. See how they moved from Compose.io to AWS to Elasticsearch Service (formerly known as Elastic Cloud) in order to tackle their growing data ingest needs, up to nearly 1 million records this year alone. Learn how they revamped their entire system, including combining and indexing all of their data into a new Elasticsearch cluster, to improve speed by 10X and ensure continued success as they scale for exponential growth.

video:video.video:title: Deep Dive Machine Learning (French)
video:video.video:description: Lancée officiellement dans la version 5.5, machine learning (ML) vous permet de tirer parti de vos données automatiquement. Cette session vous montrera comment utiliser la Suite Elastic pour ingérer, enrichir, visualiser, analyser et créer des alertes sur des logs NGINX pour détecter, et éventuellement prédire, les anomalies au sein de vos données.

video:video.video:title: Item Based Search - Paris Meetup June 2014 (FR)
video:video.video:description: This talk will introduce the concept of querying by examples. It covers a couple of features used for multimedia search, and some matching procedures such as kNN and Bayesian Sets. Finally, it will conclude with Lucene More Like This and show how it relates to the concepts previously exposed.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch in Anger: Stories from the GitHub Search Clusters
video:video.video:description: Over the past two years GitHub's source code search product has grown from a small research project into a very large index containing nearly 4 billion documents. This is an ever changing and continuously growing data set that has presented us with some interesting scaling problems. This talk will cover how they have tackled these scaling problems - from monitoring and alerting, application changes, growing clusters, and tuning Lucene parameters.

video:video.video:title: Wikimedia: Navigating the World's Encyclopedia
video:video.video:description: Over the last year and a half, Wikimedia has switched from a home-grown search solution based on Lucene 2 to a highly redundant Elasticsearch cluster powering billions of user prefix and full-text searches. This talk will outline the brief history of search at Wikimedia, why we went with Elasticsearch, how we have scaled it and what we have built, and finally touch on the integration and features we have provided to users of our platform.

video:video.video:title: Customer Panel Featuring E*Trade, kCura, and GuideStar
video:video.video:description: Marty Messer, Elastic VP of Customer Care, sits down with Chris O'Keefe, E*Trade Senior Vice President of Engineering, Andrew Sieja, kCura CEO and Founder, and Shane Ward, GuideStar Data Architect, for a fireside chat about using Elastic solutions across a variety of use cases.

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ BAI Communications (Melbourne)
video:video.video:description: BAI Canada, a subsidiary of Australia-based BAI Communications, has built a public Wi-Fi offering in both the Toronto and NYC subway systems, where roughly 2 million unique devices totaling 14 million log-ons per month use the service. Their implementation of the Elastic Stack handles around 10 million new records per day and growing. Learn how BAI Canada has designed, architected, and run the Elastic Stack to help report on and monitor usage in one of the largest types of Wi-Fi deployments. See their plans for the future, including upcoming work in Australia.

video:video.video:title: Brazil (Virtual) 2020 - Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: Ouça os criadores do Elastic Stack falarem sobre o futuro do Elasticsearch, do Kibana, do Beats e do Logstash, bem como sobre novos recursos e soluções, a expansão das opções de implantação e a evolução do panorama das soluções.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Cloud.(next)
video:video.video:description: Learn about all the things coming in Elastic Cloud and Elastic Cloud Enterprise, like support for mixed clusters and how to mix and match hardware for hot and warm data, machine learning, and more in a single cluster. You will also hear about our planned Kubernetes integration, security features, and more.

video:video.video:title: Logs, métricas y APM: El trío de operaciones
video:video.video:description: Combina tus logs, métricas y, desde ahora, datos de APM, y mejora tu visibilidad operativa. Descubre la forma en la que Elasticsearch combina con eficiencia estos tipos de datos en un único almacén y cómo se utiliza Kibana para buscar logs, analizar métricas y sacar partido a APM para disfrutar de una supervisión del rendimiento mejorada y una resolución de problemas más rápida.Esta presentación será en Español.

video:video.video:title: 使用 Elastic Stack 进行端对端安全分析
video:video.video:description: 希望在日新月异的安全领域领先竞争对手吗？了解如何按照您需要的速度和规模创建集中式安全分析平台，以便在威胁检测和跟踪活动中进行不定期分析。

video:video.video:title: Tokyo 2017: Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: CEOであるShay Banonが、Elastic Stackのロードマップや、ログ・メトリック分析からAPMソリューションまで、詳しく紹介します。

video:video.video:title: Elastic Cause Award: Refugee Datathon Munich
video:video.video:description:
The Refugee Datathon started in 2015, when thousands of refugees were welcomed in Munich. Hear how Suny Kim and Maxi Richt used the Elastic Stack and the power of open data to help activists get reliable, recent data on refugee movement, and make an impact on the pro-refugee movement.
Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: NSHC: Security in the Age of the Dark Web (Korean)
video:video.video:description: In this session, NSHC demonstrates the process of how they collect, analyze, and secure data using Elasticsearch in the age of the Dark Web, a part of the World Wide Web that is only accessible by means of special software, allowing users and website operators to remain anonymous or untraceable.

video:video.video:title: What's the Latest in Logstash? (2016)
video:video.video:description: Elastic's Jordan Sissel and Suyog Rao present the latest and greatest Logstash news and previews at Elastic{ON}16 in San Francisco, February 18, 2016.

video:video.video:title: What's the Latest in Logstash
video:video.video:description: Much has happened since 5.0. Persistent queues, pipeline viewer (x-ray vision, basically) and the ability to run multiple pipelines at the same time for different use cases, and a move to the latest version of JRuby — it's all laying the foundation for even more goodness to come.See where the Logstash roadmap is headed and what to expect next.

video:video.video:title: Leboncoin - Retour d'Experience sur le Déploiement d'ELK (FR)
video:video.video:description: Présentation d'un retour d'expérience sur la mise en place de la stack ELK chez Leboncoin pour le monitoring des logs. Nous parlerons de l'architecture, des problèmes rencontrés, de l'utilisation de respec pour tester la configuration de logstash.

video:video.video:title: DigitalGov Search: Search & Anaytics at the U.S. General Services Administration
video:video.video:description: Marty Messer, Elastic VP of Customer Care, sits down with Loren Siebert, Tech Lead at DigitalGov Search, for a fireside chat about the evolution of search and analytics at the United States General Services Administration and how Elastic solutions have helped along the way.

video:video.video:title: A Consistent Search Experience in No Time
video:video.video:description: One main objective of the Goldman Sachs Search project was to minimise programming effort when onboarding new data sets, providing a fast and responsive way to search for data with a consistent user experience. Reuben Tonna, lead architect for Goldman Sachs Search, highlights how engineering has used Elasticsearch to achieve this.

video:video.video:title: Opower(ing) Energy Efficiency
video:video.video:description: The challenge and success of using Elasticsearch to provide data visualization and targeting for personalizing utility customer messaging intended to maximize energy savings.

video:video.video:title: Customer Story(Posco): Life after Google Search Appliances
video:video.video:description: 포스코 그룹 Enterprise Search 시스템은 기존 Google Search Appliance를 Elastic 기반으로 교체한 사례입니다. 사용자 중심의 보다 나은 엔터프라이즈 검색 기능 구현을 위한 개발, 테스트, 이관, X-Pack 활용 등의 과정이 소개 됩니다.

video:video.video:title: Search amélioré en utilisant le NLP (French)
video:video.video:description: Le NLP aide les ordinateurs à comprendre un peu mieux ce que les utilisateurs recherchent. Le NLP va permettre aux applications de recherche de retourner de meilleurs résultats en enrichissant les documents passés à Elasticsearch. Mais comment implémenter ces solutions ? Dans cette présentation, nous verrons comment utiliser Elasticsearch en addition de solutions NLP.

video:video.video:title: Seoul 2017: Ingest and the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Walk through all things ingest for Logstash 5.x, from dead letter and persistent queues to the Grok Debugger and new monitoring APIs. Then get caught up on new lightweight data shipper additions like Heartbeat and Metricbeat, as well as new modules that simplify the getting started process.

video:video.video:title: What’s Evolving in the Elastic Stack - Boston 2018
video:video.video:description: See product roadmaps for Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, and Logstash with demos and announcements for everything from rollups to Elasticsearch SQL.

video:video.video:title: Managing Elasticsearch Clusters with Elastic Cloud Enterprise
video:video.video:description: Learn how to easily deploy and manage secure Elasticsearch clusters at scale and on the infrastructure of your choice using Elastic Cloud Enterprise.

video:video.video:title: Powering a BI application with Elasticsearch at Yodle
video:video.video:description: Yodle recently transitioned from using Hadoop/Scalding to Elasticsearch to power a tailored BI product for franchises. This talk will detail the impact this transition has had on the product, our customers, and engineer efficiency.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Cause Award Honoree: Using Elasticsearch to Augment Community Healthcare at Dimagi
video:video.video:description:
Dimagi uses Elasticsearch to help power key workflows in fighting India's tuberculosis epidemic. Hear how they generalized this solution in their platform to deal with migration and drug adherence of HIV/AIDS patients in South Africa, Lesotho, Swaziland, Uganda, and Cameroon.
Download presentation slides

video:video.video:title: Nori: The Official Elasticsearch Plugin for Korean Language Analysis
video:video.video:description: 이 세션에 참가하셔서 한국어 형태소 분석기 노리의 배경 이야기를 들어보세요. 노리의 원본 문서에서부터 Lucene 모듈에서 최초 실행까지, Elasticsearch 6.4에서 노리를 출시할 수 있게 되기까지의 모든 단계에 대해 얘기합니다.

video:video.video:title: Optimizing The Design of New Microbes Using Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Zymergen has developed a new, industrialized process to create microbes capable of fermenting chemicals, pharmaceuticals and more. Success depends on insights gleaned from large volumes of possible DNA modifications. This talk will cover how Elasticsearch powers this revolution in scientific data analysis.

video:video.video:title: Migration d’un cluster de 130 TB d’Elasticsearch 2 à 5 sans coupure (French)
video:video.video:description: Ce talk explique comment Synthesio a migré un cluster de 130TB et 50 milliards de documents d’Elasticsearch 2 vers la version 5 sans coupure de service et avec la possibilité de rollbacker à tout moment.Il s’attache notamment à décrire l’opération mise en place et les différents pièges à éviter pour une migration sans douleur.

video:video.video:title: _Search? Made Simple: Elastic + App Search
video:video.video:description: Get an in-depth look at Elastic App Search, the fastest and simplest way to add search to your internal or external application. Learn how to quickly deploy highly relevant and performant search in your app.

video:video.video:title: Ingest and the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Walk through all things ingest for Logstash 5.x, from dead letter and persistent queues to the Grok Debugger and new monitoring APIs. Then get caught up on new lightweight data shipper additions like Heartbeat and Metricbeat, as well as new modules that simplify the getting started process.

video:video.video:title: Finding Cars and Hunting Down Logs: Elasticsearch @ AutoScout24
video:video.video:description: As an early adopter of Elasticsearch, AutoScout24 has tried it all. In this talk, we'll take you on a journey through both our failures and successes. We'll show how our different use cases required different approaches in how best to use the Elastic Stack and how our current implementation in AWS is based on the immutable infrastructure principle.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stack (ELK) 最新动态
video:video.video:description: 了解 Elasticsearch、Kibana、Beats 和 Logstash 的产品路线图，並且会有精彩演示和重磅发布，涵盖从 rollup（汇总）到 Elastic SQL 在内的方方面面。

video:video.video:title: The Evolution of Log Insight at MZ Games
video:video.video:description: Machine Zone is the company behind massively-multiplayer online games Game of War, Fire Age, and Mobile Strike. Real-time operation of these games is essential to provide a great user experience. As a result, the engineering team at MZ evolved from using grep with pssh to the Elastic Stack as the critical engine behind their operational intelligence. In this talk, Eric and Reggie will walk through how they optimized the Elastic Stack over time to maximize their insight, touch upon their infrastructure set up, go over their most commonly used dashboards, share case studies on debugging, as well as provide details on how they established a system to track player activity to support customer service.

video:video.video:title: Seoul 2017: Kibana Deep Dive (Korean)
video:video.video:description: It's the grand tour of new visualizations and exciting updates in Kibana, including time series visual builder, heatmaps, Timelion, tag clouds, Watcher UI, and cluster alerts. Plus, a look at what's to come in 6.x.

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ BAI Canada: Analyzing a Football Stadium Worth of Wi-Fi Data Every Hour
video:video.video:description: BAI Canada/Transit Wireless has built a public Wi-Fi offering in both the Toronto and NYC subway systems, where roughly 2 million unique devices totaling 14 million log-ons per month use the service. Their implementation of the Elastic Stack handles around 10 million new records per day and growing. Learn how BAI Canada/Transit Wireless has designed, architected, and run the Elastic Stack to help report on and monitor usage in one of the largest types of Wi-Fi deployments.

video:video.video:title: RICH IT: Manejando mil millones de registros diarios en el sector financiero Mexicano
video:video.video:description: Los clientes de RICH IT generan más de mil millones de logs de seguridad y registros transaccionales al día. Conozca cómo Elastic permite a sus clientes dar sentido a los más de 1.000.000.000 de registros que capturan diariamente.

video:video.video:title: Insoftar: Optimizando los tiempos de respuesta con Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Insoftar es una empresa de arquitectura de software inteligente. Vea cómo Insoftar mejoró la información entregada a los clientes y cómo consiguieron un ahorro del 35% en infraestructura al migrar a Elastic Cloud.

video:video.video:title: Análisis a fondo de roadmap del Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Obtén información sobre las características mediante demostraciones y anuncios, desde replicación entre clusters e índices congelados en Elasticsearch hasta Kibana Spaces y el conjunto de integraciones de datos en constante crecimiento en Beats y Logstash.

video:video.video:title: Búsqueda para todos con Elastic Workplace Search
video:video.video:description: Ve cómo reimaginamos la búsqueda empresarial para que puedas llegar rápido a la información que necesitas en tu trabajo, mediante una experiencia de búsqueda unificada, conectores de datos listos para usar e interfaces de administración de búsqueda simples.

video:video.video:title: Combinación de logs, métricas y rastreos para observabilidad unificada
video:video.video:description: Conoce cómo Elasticsearch combina los datos con eficiencia en un solo repositorio de datos y cómo se usa Kibana para analizarlos. Además, podrás ver cómo los desarrollos recientes ayudan a identificar, solucionar y resolver problemas operativos más rápido.

video:video.video:title: Comment Elasticsearch a permis à Orange de mettre en place leur moteur de recherche
video:video.video:description: Orange améliore la performance de son moteur de recherche français en combinant Elasticsearch et Kibana, pour un filtrage plus efficace et interactif des documents Web apparaissant dans les listes de résultats de son moteur de recherche.

video:video.video:title: Die perfekte Feriensuche mit Elasticsearch (DE)
video:video.video:description: Wie man eine vorhandene Suchapplikation ersetzt. Holidaycheck erzählt von der Implementierung von Elasticsearch, der Verbesserung des Sucherlebnisses und der Kommunikation mit den Stakeholdern.

video:video.video:title: Between Two Ferns with XO Group
video:video.video:description: Marty Messer, Elastic VP of Customer Care, chats with Irina Krechmer and Emad Saghir of the XO Group — the fine folks behind theKnot, theBumb, & theNest — for a fireside chat about how switching to Elasticsearch dramatically improved the user experience across theKnot.com. Plus a look into what's next for the XO Group and how Elasticsearch is coming along for the ride.

video:video.video:title: Between Two Ferns with TrueCar
video:video.video:description: Marty Messer, Elastic VP of Customer Care, chats with Russ Foltz-Smith, GM of Data Products, about the growth and innovation around search and analytics at TrueCar.

video:video.video:title: Elastic{ON} Tour Keynote - Shay Banon
Second Annual Elastic{ON} Women's Breakfast
video:video.video:description: We assembled a panel of executives and engineers to talk about their experiences in the software and technology space. They discussed approaches to growing their careers, navigated key challenges and difficult decisions, and how they have promoted diversity and equality in tech.

video:video.video:title: Intégration de la Suite Elastic à la plateforme interne d’Amadeus (French)
video:video.video:description: Aymeric Gerardin, Manager SRE for Data Management & Monitoring Division et Luca Belluccini, Elastic Stack Lead Developer for Queueing & Data Store Department chez Amadeus, partageront leur expérience en revenant sur les défis relevés et les leçons retenues pour finalement aboutir au succès de leur projet Elastic.

video:video.video:title: Being Elastic: The Who, The Where, The How
video:video.video:description: A distributed system...built by a distributed team...in a company committed to distributed work. Join this session to learn more about Elastic the company. Who we are. Where we are. How we work.What is it that makes Elastic – well – elastic? What are some characteristics of an Elastician? What are the actual things that we care about and the aspirational statements we make to chart our course into the future?

video:video.video:title: Security Starts at the Endpoint
video:video.video:description: The job of protecting the enterprise has become increasingly complex. We make it simple. Elastic Endpoint Security will be the only endpoint protection product to fully combine prevention, detection, and response into a single autonomous agent. It's easy to use, built for speed, and stops exploits at the earliest stages of attack. Join this session to see a live demo and get all your questions about endpoint protection answered.

video:video.video:title: Data Hero: Legends of Analytics
video:video.video:description: Activision knows that social media platform Twitter is a critically important channel for interacting with Activision's players. Learn how Activision uses the Elastic Stack, natural language processing, and event detection algorithms to turn tweet streams into information that supports the operations of its games.

video:video.video:title: リクルート流Elasticsearchの使い方 (Japanese)
video:video.video:description: リクルート流のElasticsearch活用方法についての講演です。全社検索基盤「QASS」や、全社プッシュ通知基盤「Pusna-RS」、 その他サービスの可視化について皆様に共有されています。

video:video.video:title: Logging, indicateurs et APM : le trio gagnant pour des opérations réussies
video:video.video:description: Pour une meilleure visibilité opérationnelle, centralisez les logs, les indicateurs et, désormais, les données APM. Découvrez comment Elasticsearch regroupe efficacement ces types de données au même endroit. De même, découvrez comment utiliser Kibana pour rechercher des logs, analyser des indicateurs et exploiter les fonctionnalités APM afin de mieux surveiller les performances et de résoudre les problèmes plus rapidement.Cette session sera présentée en français.

video:video.video:title: Running the Elastic Stack on Kubernetes - Madrid 2020
video:video.video:description: Descubra la mejor forma de ejecutar el Elastic Stack en Kubernetes usando Elastic Cloud on Kubernetes (ECK), integrada en el panel del operador. Descubre cómo puedes empezar a usar ECK para actualizar fácilmente las versiones y aplicar cambios de configuración, disfrutar de una alta disponibilidad y seguridad, además de otras muchas ventajas.

video:video.video:title: Opening Keynote - Madrid 2020
video:video.video:description: Descubre la visión que hay tras los cambios en los productos de Elastic, desde las nuevas características y soluciones, hasta las mayores opciones de despliegue. Escucha qué tienen que decir los creadores del Elastic Stack sobre el futuro de Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats y Logstash, además de la evolución del panorama de soluciones.

video:video.video:title: Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability - Madrid 2020
video:video.video:description: La visibilidad operativa de tus servicios y aplicaciones puede alcanzar un nuevo nivel si centralizas los datos de tus logs, métricas de infraestructuras, APM y monitoreo de tiempo de actividad. Descubre cómo Elasticsearch combina de forma eficiente estos tipos de datos en un solo almacén y cómo los usa Kibana para analizarlos. Verás cómo identificar, diagnosticar y resolver problemas operativos más rápidamente gracias a los últimos desarrollos, como Metrics Explorer, el streaming de cola de logs, la compatibilidad para el seguimiento distribuido en APM y la integración con Prometheus.

video:video.video:title: Americas East (Virtual) 2020: Elasticsearch on Azure
video:video.video:description: Search, Observe, Protect with native Elasticsearch capabilities on Azure, regardless of whether you’re targeting Azure as your cloud, hybrid, or multi-cloud. Join the creators of the Elastic Stack and Microsoft product experts to learn best practices around deployment, scaling, and security and get a sneak peek at what's next for Elastic on Microsoft Azure.

video:video.video:title: US Public Sector (Virtual) 2020: Search for All with Elastic Workplace Search
video:video.video:description: Learn how we reimagined search in the workplace so you can get to the information you need quickly with a unified search experience, out-of-the-box data connectors, and simple search management interfaces.

video:video.video:title: Brazil (Virtual) 2020: Elastic Security: Enterprise Protection Built on the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: O Elastic Security fornece prevenção, coleta, detecção e resposta globais em situações de ameaça aos dados. Saiba como superar os adversários com tecnologia de várias camadas, veja demonstrações ao vivo e obtenha respostas para todas as suas dúvidas.

video:video.video:title: Tokyo 2017: Elastic Cloud Deep Dive (Japanese)
video:video.video:description: Elastic Cloud Enterpriseをお好きな環境で運用し、セキュアにElasticsearchクラスターを展開・管理する方法をご紹介します。

video:video.video:title: France (Virtual) 2020: Keynote
video:video.video:description: Les créateurs de la Suite Elastic vous parleront de l'avenir d'Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats et Logstash, des nouvelles solutions, fonctionnalités et options de déploiement, ainsi que d'un paysage en pleine évolution.

video:video.video:title: France (Virtual) 2020: Search for All with Elastic Workplace Search
video:video.video:description: Nous avons repensé la recherche pour les entreprises, afin d'accélérer l'accès aux informations : découvrez une expérience de recherche unifiée, des connecteurs de données immédiatement opérationnels et des interfaces de gestion simplissimes.

video:video.video:title: Customer Story(11번가): Order monitoring and anomaly detection with Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: 11번가는 2년에 걸쳐 MSA(Micro Service Architecture)로의 전환을 진행하고 있고 작년에는 MSA 만으로는 해결이 어려운 주문과 결제 부분의 문제를 해결하기 위해서 Kafka를 이용한 이벤트 기반의 아키텍쳐를 도입하였습니다.Elasticsearch를 이용해서 모니터링과 장애 감지를 어떻게 했는지에 대해 소개하고, 앞으로 Elasticsearch를 커머스에서 좀 더 활용하기 위한 방법에 대해서 얘기하고자 합니다.

video:video.video:title: REX : classification de courriers postaux avec Elasticsearch (FR)
video:video.video:description: Ce soir, je vous parle d'un cas d'utilisation un peu atypique d'Elasticsearch : la classification de courriers postaux pour déterminer le service destinataire. On parlera classification par moteur de règles, classification par apprentissage supervisé, structure de document "nested", et chaîne d'analyse pour détecter le code postal de l'émetteur. Enfin, je terminerai avec quelques stats montrant la performance de l'ensemble... avec Kibana bien sûr :)

video:video.video:title: Au cœur du Machine Learning
video:video.video:description: Découvrez la prévision de séries temporelles et la catégorisation automatique des données de log. Les fonctions de Machine Learning d’Elastic se sont considérablement développées pour créer un outil puissant qui automatise les notifications en cas d’anomalies et simplifie les tâches, comme la préconfiguration de l’analyse des logs NGINX à l’échelle. Découvrez comment appliquer cette solution pour vos données.

video:video.video:title: What's Next for Elastic Cloud
video:video.video:description: Elastic Cloud is Elastic’s official Elasticsearch hosted offering, allowing you to provision and use clusters on AWS at a click of a button. More recently, we've been working on Elastic Cloud Enterprise, which allows users to setup an Elastic Cloud environment on their own infrastructure and manage tens, hundreds – even thousands of clusters with ease. In this session, Alex and Chris will cover past, present, and future for Elastic Cloud and Elastic Cloud Enterprise. They'll touch on how it works, as well as give a live demo of Elastic Cloud Enterprise, where they’ll provision, secure, scale, and upgrade an Elasticsearch cluster with just a few clicks.

video:video.video:title: London 2017 - Elasticsearch Deep Dive
video:video.video:description: Dive in with Clinton to learn how to use the latest features in Elasticsearch.

video:video.video:title: Cyber Hunting at Perched with the Elastic Stack & X-Pack
video:video.video:description: Perched is using Elastic's X-Pack to analyze intrusions as they progress through a campaign and exploring methods to push them back through the kill-chain.

video:video.video:title: Keynote（基調講演）
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch、Kibana、Beat、Logstashの今後の見通しや新機能、進化を続けるソリューションやデプロイオプションについてご紹介します。

video:video.video:title: Keynote - Europe 2020
video:video.video:description: Hear directly from the creators of the stack on the future of Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, and Logstash, new features and solutions, expanding deployment options, and the evolving solutions landscape.

video:video.video:title: Europe (Virtual) 2020: Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability
video:video.video:description: Learn how Elasticsearch efficiently combines data in a single store and how Kibana is used to analyze it. Plus, see how recent developments help identify, troubleshoot, and resolve operational issues faster.

video:video.video:title: ぐるなびが活用するElastic Cloud
video:video.video:description: ぐるなびは、Elastic Stackを活用することで膨大なログデータを瞬時に解析し障害対応の迅速化を実現しています。オンプレミスでの課題を解決し、よりKibanaの強力な機能を活用するためにElastic Cloudへマイグレーションを行いました。Elastic Cloudによって解決された課題や、今後の検索基盤としての利用、ビジネス戦略の分析用途などの活用事例をご説明いたします。

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch on Azure ~ Azure上でElasticsearchを最大限活用するには ~
video:video.video:description: Azure VMでElasticsearchクラスターを実行するだけでなく、よりクラウドを活用する方法があります。 ElasticとMicrosoftのエキスパートとのディスカッションに参加して、Azureが提供する多数のサービスを活用してElastic Stackをさらに活用する方法について学びましょう。

video:video.video:title: Accelerating Elastic on Microsoft Azure
video:video.video:description: Microsoft and Elastic have partnered to bring the ELK Stack to Microsoft Azure, letting developers uncover the value and insights buried in their data by deploying search and visualization services on demand.

video:video.video:title: State of the Community
video:video.video:description: In this presentation, you'll hear from our Director of Developer Relations on all things community & the ELK Stack. You'll learn where your fellow users are, how they are contributing and and plans for the community's future. Plus, we'll show some amazing stats using our community metrics ELK dashboards. You'll leave this session with a solid understanding of how you can contribute to the ELK community and how you - and your company - can benefit from doing so.

video:video.video:title: What's Brewing in Beats? (2016)
video:video.video:description: Elastic's Monica Sarbu and Tudor Golubenco present the latest and greatest news about Beats at Elastic{ON}16 on February 17, 2016, in San Francisco.

video:video.video:title: Seoul 2017: Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: Get the update from Shay on where the Elastic Stack is headed, from logging to metrics to the APM solution that's brewing.

video:video.video:title: Quit Yammer(ing) Away & Start Analyzing Your Log Data!
video:video.video:description: Hear how Yammer ships logs from over 4,000 servers to Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana for production on-call support, monitoring, and analytics, accelerating incident detection and helping to identify trends over time.

video:video.video:title: Prácticas recomendadas en materia de arquitectura y errores que debes evitar
video:video.video:description: Crece con confianza. Desde la implementación de un pequeño nodo de desarrollo para la búsqueda de aplicaciones hasta la gestión de una gran implementación de cientos de nodos, nuestros expertos en Elastic te contarán todo lo que necesites saber.Esta presentación será en Español.

video:video.video:title: Opening Keynote - Munich 2017
video:video.video:description: Get the update from Shay on where the Elastic Stack is headed, from logging to metrics to the APM solution that's brewing.

video:video.video:title: Unleashing Elasticsearch: Taking the Reins Off @ Atlassian
video:video.video:description: Atlassian is using Elasticsearch to power its internal logging platform, depended on by dozens of internal product teams. Find out how a small team is delivering big wins by choosing to build on top of Elasticsearch and AWS, and where they're taking Elasticsearch next.

video:video.video:title: Upgrade to 6.0: Leading with Empathy
video:video.video:description: This is the story of how we built an Elastic upgrade experience that spans products, versions, and users. It begins with relationships, is sustained by empathy, and is challenged by the unknown.The complexity of the project from the cross-product integration level should not be underestimated, nor should the difficulty of supporting users beset with different scenarios. Hear about the surprises we experienced along the journey that impacted release dates and see what to expect in the 7.0 upgrade.

video:video.video:title: Análisis de seguridad integral con Elastic
video:video.video:description: ¿Te interesa mantener una posición de ventaja frente a posibles ataques en el cambiante panorama de seguridad actual? Descubre cómo crear una plataforma de análisis de seguridad centralizada con la velocidad y escala que necesitas y disfruta de análisis personalizados durante los ejercicios de detección de amenazas.Esta presentación será en Español.

video:video.video:title: Ingestion de données avec la Suite Elastic (French)
video:video.video:description: Entrez dans le monde de l’ingestion de données avec Logstash 5.x qui inclut des nouvelles fonctionnalités tels que dead letter, persistent queues, Grok Debugger et les nouvelles API de monitoring. Puis familiarisez-vous avec les agents légers pour le transfert de données : Heartbeat et Metricbeat.

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ The Ministry of Health/Datasus
video:video.video:description: A Asper ajuda o Ministério da Saúde no Brasil a indexar dados através da utilização de API REST, tornando-os acessíves a qualquer aplicação e garantindo busca textual e fonética de forma rápida e eficiente.A Elastic Stack é utilizada com o Elasticsearch como uma ponte entre as bases de dados e as aplicações, o Logstash para ingestão de dados e o Kibana para criação de painéis com visualizações gráficas atualizadas em tempo real.Saiba como a equipe da ASPER projeta, arquiteta e implementa projetos utilizando o Elastic Cloud Enterprise.

video:video.video:title: Graduating with Honors: How Quizlet is Scaling Elasticsearch to Help Children Learn
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch is powering a generation of learning on Quizlet -  a tool used by millions of students to study for classes and assessments. With over 60 million study sets, finding the right content is essential to user experience, making Elasticsearch a key piece of user experience and infrastructure. This talk will focus on how Quizlet scaled their cluster for the yearly ramp-up in traffic as students returned to school this past fall as well as touching on the benefits of working directly with Elastic's support team in the process.

video:video.video:title: Q&A about Open Source Technology at Goldman Sachs
video:video.video:description: Aaron Katz, Elastic VP of Worldwide Field Operations, sat down with Don Duet, Goldman Sachs Co-Head of Technology, to discuss using open source technology like Elasticsearch across the organization.

video:video.video:title: Elastic{ON} 2015 Highlights Reel
video:video.video:description: Elastic{ON} 2015 was the first-ever user conference that brought together Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana experts and fans from all over the world face to face. It was held at Pier 27 in San Francisco, CA and hosted over 1,200 attendees. The speakers were fantastic. The attendees were top-notch. And the food was great. We had a blast. Here’s a taste of all the goodness that transpired.

video:video.video:title: 用户案例： 联想集团
video:video.video:description: 杨磊是联想的高级技术研发经理。他负责 IT 集成部门 Elastic Stack 的运营和开发。他们的团队开发开源中间件产品，负责设计全球应用程序集成架构和解决方案。杨磊将分享他的部门如何开始使用 Elasticsearch 以及如何将其应用于中间件用例。

video:video.video:title: Elastic como solución herramienta de Gestión de Logs en plataforma PaaS Privada
video:video.video:description: Conoce el testimonio de usuarios locales que han sacado partido a Elastic para llevar a cabo análisis de negocio, analítica de ciberseguridad, moniorización, etc.

video:video.video:title: Metrics As a Service au Groupe La Poste : un monitoring autonome d’OpenShift / Kubernetes avec la suite Elastic
video:video.video:description: Dès l’installation de leur première infrastructure, l’équipe ITaaS s’est concentrée sur la centralisation des logs et une remontée de métriques pour visualiser et analyser les containers : cpu, mémoire, disques etc... Au fil des mois, l’équipe a ajouté les métriques APACHE puis JMX et fournit une visualisation des logs et métriques grâce aux fonctionnalités d’auto-discovery des Beats. A présent, l’infrastructure constitue le backbone de gestion des métriques à la fois dans Elasticsearch et Graphite mais aussi avec leurs outils de visualisation: Kibana et Grafana.

video:video.video:title: From Apache to Solr to Elasticsearch: The Evolution of Zendesk's Search Experience
video:video.video:description: Zendesk manages terabytes of customer data in the form of support ticket comments, user data, knowledge base content, etc. In Zendesk's previous search architecture based on Apache Solr 3.6 (pre-cloud), manual sharding, operational overhead, difficulty of schema updates, and lack of near-real time indexing was limiting scalability, performance and development velocity. This talk will provide insights into the reasons Zendesk migrated from Apache Solr to Elasticsearch, the journey, and the lessons learned while building their new search and indexing architecture.

video:video.video:title: Opening keynote - Denver 2020
video:video.video:description: See the vision behind changes coming to Elastic products, from new features and solutions to what’s to come after joining forces with endpoint security company Endgame. Hear directly from the creators of the Elastic Stack on the future of Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, and Logstash and the evolving solutions landscape.

video:video.video:title: Le cas d'usage de Elasticsearch chez Logmatic.io - Elasticsearch Meetup Paris November 2014 (FR)
video:video.video:description: Logmatic.io est un système SaaS d'analyse de logs basé sur un cluster Elasticsearch. Encore en béta-privée, cette technologie révolutionne la vision de valeur portée par les données machines. Ceci en poussant à des usages à la fois simples de configuration et extrêmement puissants s'adressant à tous les corps de métier de l'entreprise.

video:video.video:title: Deep Dive Elasticsearch (French)
video:video.video:description: Cross-cluster search, ingest node, rollover API, shrink API, field collapsing, unified highlighter… tant de nouvelles fonctionnalités qui vous feront aimer Elasticsearch. Mettez-vous à niveau sur 5.x et découvrez comment 6.x résout les problèmes de scaling, mise à niveau, recovery, sparse data et l’utilisation de disque.

video:video.video:title: Une plateforme Data 360 au Ministère des Armements avec la Suite Elastic
video:video.video:description: Le ministère des Armées génère un grand nombre de données dans les domaines administratifs et opérationnels. Afin d’optimiser l’exploitation de ces données pour une prise de décision plus aisée, le LABO BI et Big data a mis en place une plateforme Big Data/IA dénommée Data360 qui permet de croiser des données de diverses sources (financières, ressources humaines, des IoT…) et également d’utiliser l’intelligence artificielle sur ces données. Cette plateforme utilise en partie des composants de la Suite Elastic.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch au coeur du projet Data Lake de Renault (French)
video:video.video:description: Kamélia Benchekroun, Responsable Data Lake IT Squad chez Renault, présentera la création et la mise en place d’une plateforme Elasticsearch pour leur data lake et donnera un aperçu de leur nouveau projet Elastic Cloud Entreprise, actuellement en cours.

video:video.video:title: The Contributor's Guide to the Kibana Galaxy
video:video.video:description: Don't Panic! Exploring the expanses of the Kibana galaxy alone can be daunting, but join us to discover the answer to the greatest question - how does it all work? We will venture into the belly of the beast to discover how Kibana works, and how you can modify and extend it.In this presentation, we'll cover: Setting up Kibana for Development Under the Hood: Dependency Management to Server Architecture Major Components : Apps to Aggregation TypesContributing : Enhancing KibanaWe'll conclude the presentation with a live demo. Attendees will leave this presentation with a deep understanding of how Kibana works, why it works that way and how to use Kibana to get deep insights into their datasets.

video:video.video:title: IBM Logging and Monitoring Service in IBM Bluemix
video:video.video:description: The Logging and Monitoring Service in IBM Bluemix provides Elasticsearch capability to containers and VMs in IBM Bluemix. We'll show the current service, talk about our experience scaling Elasticsearch to support cloud level scale, and show where we're headed in the future.

video:video.video:title: "It’s all in the {find} y’know” @ the BBC
video:video.video:description: In this presentation Michael outlines how the Elastic Stack has been deployed to meet the challenges of maximising value from the BBC’s archives. Using real world examples see how today’s technology is unlocking yesterday’s content and a vision for the future of media search.

video:video.video:title: Analyse de sécurité de bout en bout avec la Suite Elastic
video:video.video:description: Vous voulez prendre une longueur d’avance sur la concurrence, dans l’univers en constante évolution des solutions de sécurité ? Découvrez comment créer une plateforme centralisée d’analyse de la sécurité qui réponde à vos exigences de volumétrie et de rapidité d’investigation.Cette session sera présentée en français.

video:video.video:title: Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability
video:video.video:description: La observabilidad operativa de tus servicios y aplicaciones puede alcanzar un nuevo nivel si centralizas los datos de tus logs, métricas de infraestructuras, APM y monitoreo de tiempo de actividad. Descubre cómo Elasticsearch combina de forma eficiente estos  datos en un solo almacén y cómo los combina KibanaVerás cómo identificar, diagnosticar y resolver problemas operativos de manera más rápida y eficiente gracias a los últimos desarrollos, como Metrics Explorer, el streaming de cola de logs, la compatibilidad para el seguimiento distribuido en APM y la integración con Prometheus.

video:video.video:title: Logging and Metrics in Elastic Cloud: Drinking Our Own Champagne
video:video.video:description: In Elastic Cloud, we've migrated from a polyglot logging solution to one based entirely on the Elastic Stack. Hear members of the Cloud SRE team talk about making the switch and cover architectural and implementation concerns, care, and feeding, as well as lessons learned. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: Elastic{ON} 2017 Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: Say "heya" to Elastic{ON} 2017, the largest single gathering of Elastic Stack users around the world. Hear from Shay on exciting product announcements with live demos from key people in our engineering and product teams - Tudor Golubenco on Beats, Chris Cowan on timeseries in Kibana, Steve Dodson on machine learning, Uri Cohen on Elastic Cloud, Costin Leau on Elasticsearch SQL, and Rashid Khan on Canvas in Kibana. Steven introduces the three winners of the Elastic Cause Awards, highlighting how the Elastic Stack is used to help solve global problems.

video:video.video:title: Search for All with Elastic Workplace Search - Madrid 2020
video:video.video:description: Descubre cómo hemos reinventado la búsqueda en el entorno de trabajo para que tú y tu equipo podáis acceder rápidamente a la información que necesitéis con una experiencia de búsqueda idéntica, conectores de datos instantáneos e interfaces de gestión de búsquedas sencillas. Busca en documentos, datos empresariales e información de las cuentas de la forma más rápida y natural que jamás pudiste imaginar. Así es la búsqueda empresarial, así es el método Elastic.

video:video.video:title: Big Data in Mixed Reality (MxR)
video:video.video:description: Stormfish uses the Elastic Stack to support the development of a number of MxR environments using big data, including several for the Army Research Lab. Their cutting-edge research and development team attempts to analyze, understand, and contextualize insights from big data in real time to aid decision-making in rapidly evolving, fast-paced environments. Hear how they use the Elastic Stack to ingest data from disparate sources, run real-time analytics, and export the insights to an operational MxR environment. See a demo of an example MxR analytic environment with a simulated game environment showcasing the safe navigation of forces and the identification of priority targets in dense, urban terrains. Plus, hear about about lessons learned and get insights on where use cases for analytic MxR environments might go next. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: 記事検索とログ解析でのElasticsearch活用事例 (Japanese)
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearchを活用した記事検索・ログ解析についての事例をご紹介頂いています。Kibanaを利用したエラーやファイル毎の可視化、アクセスが多い地域の分析も行っています。

video:video.video:title: Comment Natixis Financement a enrichi sa vision client avec Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Natixis Financement obtient une vision complète de sa clientéle grâce aux capacités de collecte de données multi-source en temps réel et au système de requêtes d'Elasticsearch.

video:video.video:title: Canvas for Building Real-time Infographics
video:video.video:description: Go behind the scenes and learn how Canvas helps you create pixel-perfect, infographic-inspired, living visualizations in Kibana. Plus, see how the new Elasticsearch SQL language plugs into Canvas.

video:video.video:title: Opening Keynote - Barcelona 2019
video:video.video:description: Descubre la visión que hay tras los cambios en los productos de Elastic, desde las nuevas características y soluciones, hasta el desarrollo de las opciones de despliegue. Escucha la opinión de los creadores del Elastic Stack sobre el futuro de Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats y Logstash, además de la evolución del panorama de soluciones.

video:video.video:title: ERDF: Centralisation de grands volumes de logs
video:video.video:description: ERDF centralise et surveille de grands volumes de logs grâce à une architecture associant les capacités de Logstash et d'Elasticsearch.

video:video.video:title: Architecture at Scale
video:video.video:description: Crece con confianza. Desde tu portátil hasta numerosos nodos o despliegues para diversos casos de uso y clústeres, nuestros expertos de Elastic compartiran las prácticas a seguir y los obstáculos que hay que evitar para escalar con éxito.

video:video.video:title: France (Virtual) 2020: Tenedis: Deploying a unified monitoring base
video:video.video:description: Au cours de cette présentation Denis LIARD, le CTO de la société Tenedis (partenaire Elastic Advanced spécialisé dans l’Observabilité, leader français avec 30M€ de CA et 80 collaborateurs), présente les enjeux et retours d’expérience de Tenedis autour du déploiement d’un Socle de Monitoring Unifié basé sur Elastic, chez des grandes comptes français. Il y décrit notamment les raisons du choix technologique porté sur Elastic, les constats réalisés au cours des premiers projets et certains points clés qui peuvent contribuer au succès d’un tel projet.

video:video.video:title: Logging, Métricas e APM: O Trio de Operações
video:video.video:description: Eleve o nível da sua visibilidade operacional com Logging , Métricas e dados APM, agora tudo no mesmo lugar. Saiba como a Elasticsearch combina de maneira eficiente esses tipos de dados em um local único e veja como o Kibana é usado para buscar logs, analisar métricas e aproveitar recursos do APM para otimizar o monitoramento de performance e a resolução de problemas.

video:video.video:title: France (Virtual) 2020: Elastic Security: Enterprise Protection Built on the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Elastic Security assure la prévention, la collecte et la détection globales des menaces qui pèsent sur les données, ainsi que la réponse globale à ces menaces. Découvrez comment prendre une longueur d'avance sur les utilisateurs malveillants grâce à une technologie multicouches, regardez des démos en direct et obtenez des réponses à vos questions.

video:video.video:title: _search? Simplifique: Elastic App Search
video:video.video:description: Conheça a fundo o Elastic App Search, a forma mais simples e rápida de adicionar busca ao seus aplicativos internos ou externos. Saiba como implantar rapidamente buscas relevantes e de alto desempenho no seu aplicativo.

video:video.video:title: Geo exploration simplified with Elastic Maps
video:video.video:description: The Elastic Stack has supported geospatial analysis since its early days, and the latest versions of Elasticsearch and Kibana deliver significant enhancements to geo capabilities. Learn how to capitalize on these new features to take your location data further, from ingest to insight, with Elastic Maps.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stack Roadmap Deep Dive
video:video.video:description: Descubre las nuevas características en las que estamos trabajando. Verás demostraciones y tendrás acceso a información sobre la replicación entre clústeres y los índices bloqueados de Elasticsearch, los espacios de Kibana y el creciente conjunto de datos de integraciones en Beats y Logstash.

video:video.video:title: France (Virtual) 2020: Informatique CDC & the Elastic Stack: Tackling multiple use cases with one stack
video:video.video:description: Informatique CDC (ICDC), filiale IT de la Caisse des Dépôts, développe, héberge et sécurise les applications IT de l’établissement public. Pour remplir cette mission, l’ICDC se repose sur une approche globale et des solutions sur mesure. Découvrez comment ICDC utilise la Suite Elastic pour répondre à différents besoins avec une seule suite technologique. Que ce soit pour résoudre des problématiques business analytics, search ou d’observabilité, ICDC a fait d’Elastic la clé de voûte de ces catégories de cas d’usage.

video:video.video:title: Keynote d'Ouverture
video:video.video:description: Découvrez les nouveautés qui se préparent pour la Suite Elastic ; que ce soit pour les cas d’usage allant du logging aux metrics ou encore la toute nouvelle solution d’APM.

video:video.video:title: Brazil (Virtual) 2020 - Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability
video:video.video:description: Saiba como o Elasticsearch combina com eficiência dados em um único armazenamento e como o Kibana é usado para analisá-los. Além disso, veja como os desenvolvimentos recentes ajudam a identificar e resolver problemas operacionais mais rapidamente.

video:video.video:title: France (Virtual) 2020: Elastic Stack Roadmap Deep Dive
video:video.video:description: Découvrez les dernières fonctionnalités grâce à nos démos et annonces : réplication inter-clusters, indices gelés d'Elasticsearch, Kibana Spaces, et toujours plus d'intégrations de données dans Beats et Logstash.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearchによるリモートワーク時代のセキュリティ対策
video:video.video:description: セキュリティレベルにばらつきのあるリモートワーク環境では、サイバー攻撃の脅威にさらされる危険性が高まります。本セッションでは、Elastic Machine Learningを活用して、不正アクセスやマルウェア感染などを自動検知する方法を解説します。

video:video.video:title: Boas Práticas de Arquitetura + O Que Evitar
video:video.video:description: Escale com confiança, seja implantando um pequeno cluster de desenvolvimento para busca em aplicativo ou gerenciando a implantação de centenas de nodes. Nossos especialistas da Elastic já viram de tudo um pouco e vão compartilhar tudo que você precisa colocar em prática e tudo que se deve evitar.

video:video.video:title: Comment Elastic s’intègre à la plateforme de recherche en médecine personnalisée au sein du CARPEM
video:video.video:description: Le CARPEM (Cancer Research and Personalised Medicine) explique comment la suite Elastic s’intègre avec d’autres solutions à leur plateforme de recherche translationnelle (PRT). Le CARPEM utilise en effet Elastic pour rassembler un volume important de données et automatiser des représentations automatiques adaptées aux différents profils d’utilisateurs. De cette manière il devient possible d’aborder les technologies de Big Data dans un contexte de recherche médicale associant de nombreuses bases de données aux données très hétérogènes et à l’architecture complexe.

video:video.video:title: Elastic at Procter & Gamble: A Network Story
video:video.video:description: The network team at Procter & Gamble inherited infrastructure from years of outsourcing different solutions for small problems. A central repository for data analysis was needed to churn through the high amount of data (nearly 6TB a day) coming from disparate software sources. Procter & Gamble chose Elastic, and Elastic Cloud Enterprise specifically, to unify their data. Learn how the Elastic Stack has offered speed, resiliency, and high availability to help Procter & Gamble achieve a greater understanding of their data, as well as introducing observability to their toolkit to help them be more proactive and provide better services.

video:video.video:title: Stories from Support: Top Problems and Solutions
video:video.video:description: You’re not alone when it comes to certain challenges with your Elasticsearch deployment. Come learn about solutions to some of the most common issues our users face from a few of our support engineers. You’ll be sure to leave with learnings you can apply to our own clusters when you get home!

video:video.video:title: What's Evolving in Elasticsearch? (2017)
video:video.video:description: The 5.0 release of Elasticsearch took advantage of the cleanups in 2.0 to add a slew of new features on top of a rock-solid foundation. Clint and Simon will give an overview of the changes already released in the 5.x series, and a taste of the big new features coming in 6.0.

video:video.video:title: Keynote - Asia Pacific 2020
video:video.video:description: Hear directly from the creators of the stack on the future of Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, and Logstash, new features and solutions, expanding deployment options, and the evolving solutions landscape.

video:video.video:title: Replacing Systems of Record with Engagement at Royal Bank of Canada
video:video.video:description: Today, almost every single major decision that drives revenue, controls costs, or reduces risk can be powered with data and analytics. Search analytics are being used to help companies react faster and smarter through insight into everything from marketing to consumer trends and beyond. See how the Royal Bank of Canada leverages a powerful event-driven microservices architecture in order to evolve from a systems-of-record way of working to systems-of-engagement. Learn how Canada's leading financial institution utilized Elastic Cloud Enterprise to accomplish mainframe offload through data analytics and drive tremendous cost savings. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: Analyse des sentiments sur Twitter avec Elastic Machine Learning (FR)
video:video.video:description: Les réseaux sociaux ont changé le web à jamais et ils ont changé beaucoup d’autres choses. La manière dont nous collectons les avis de nos clients, dont nous surveillons certains secteurs d’activités, tout ceci a changé. Comment peut-on utiliser l'option Machine learning d'Elastic pour améliorer et automatiser nos différents processus de monitoring ? Durant cette présentation, je montrerai concrètement comment intégrer les données et les enrichir avec Logstash puis nous ferons une analyse en profondeur de nos données indexées en utilisant le plugin Machine Learning d’elastic.

video:video.video:title: Kibana 5 : la fenêtre de la Suite Elastic
video:video.video:description: La nouvelle interface de la version 5.0 de Kibana est plus simple et commence à intégrer des éléments de la Suite Elastic : installation, configuration, gestion, visualisation et bien plus encore.

video:video.video:title: Transformational Search Performance with EnergyIQ
video:video.video:description: EnergyIQ manages multiple data types and sources across the full well lifecycle for oil and gas companies. Several years ago, EnergyIQ experienced query performance issues with their traditional PPDM-based relational model approach due to an explosion in data volume and complexity. They pivoted to Elasticsearch and the impact on end-user search performance, functionality, and flexibility was immediate. Learn how EnergyIQ implemented Elasticsearch and how they extended their search platform to combine the advanced spatial search capability of Elastic with industry leading GIS visualization tools.

video:video.video:title: Asia Pacific (Virtual) 2020: Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability
video:video.video:description: Learn how Elasticsearch efficiently combines data in a single store and how Kibana is used to analyze it. Plus, see how recent developments help identify, troubleshoot, and resolve operational issues faster.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stackロードマップのディープダイブ
video:video.video:description: 各種新機能と、今後のリリース予定をデモとプレゼンテーションでご紹介します。Elasticsearchのクラスター横断レプリケーションやフローズンインデックスやKibana Spaces、さらに充実したBeatsやLogstashでのデータ統合などについて取り上げます。

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stack Roadmap Deep Dive - Madrid 2020
video:video.video:description: Descubre las nuevas características en las que estamos trabajando. Verás demostraciones e información sobre la replicación entre clústeres y los índices bloqueados de Elasticsearch, los espacios de Kibana y el creciente conjunto de datos de integraciones en Beats y Logstash.

video:video.video:title: What's new in 6.0 (French)
video:video.video:description: Afin d’aider notre formidable communauté à se préparer au grand changement, Camilo Sierra, Elastic, vous expliquera les changements majeurs de la Suite Elastic 6.0. Nous parlerons de choses comme les mises à jour de versions majeures sans interruptions, des optimisations des structures de données Lucene, des Sequence IDs, de nos adieux au _type, des nouveaux modes dans les tableaux de bord, des alertes automatisées sur vos clusters Elastic, des pipelines Logstash et de leur gestion depuis Kibana, de l’intégration Beats avec Kubernetes et de tous les nouveaux modules Beats.

video:video.video:title: Security Operation Center with the Elastic Stack, what else?
video:video.video:description: The presentation will focus on the problems encountered when using the Elastic Stack for the creation of a SOC, and found solutions. These problems can be encountered in many cases of use. The topics of project preparation and Kibana plugin creation will be discussed.

video:video.video:title: Running the Elastic Stack on Kubernetes
video:video.video:description: Conocela mejor forma de ejecutar el Elastic Stack en Kubernetes usando Elastic Cloud on Kubernetes (ECK), integrado en el panel del operador. Descubre cómo puedes empezar a usar ECK para actualizar fácilmente las versiones y aplicar cambios de configuración, disfrutar de una alta disponibilidad y seguridad, además de otras muchas ventajas.

video:video.video:title: Kibana and Geo Update: Canvas, Elastic Maps, and More
video:video.video:description: Las nuevas características de Kibana te ayudan a explorar y presentar los datos con métodos innovadores, como nuevas visualizaciones y dashboards para Canvas, y mejoras en las funcionalidades de datos geoespaciales. Descubre cómo sacar el máximo partido a estas funcionalidades para poder trazar planes de acción con tus datos y así trabajar con los datos de ubicación, desde su entrada hasta análisis posterior.

video:video.video:title: Search for All with Elastic Enterprise Search
video:video.video:description: Descubre cómo hemos reinventado la búsqueda en el entorno de trabajo para que tú y tu equipo podáis acceder rápidamente a la información que necesitéis con una experiencia de búsqueda idéntica, conectores de datos instantáneos e interfaces de gestión de búsquedas sencillas. Busca en documentos, datos empresariales e información de las cuentas de la forma más rápida y natural que jamás pudiste imaginar. Así es la búsqueda empresarial, así es el método Elastic.

video:video.video:title: Elastic{ON} 2017 - The Official Elasticsearch User Conference
video:video.video:description: Our 3rd annual Elasticsearch user conference took place on March 7-9, 2017 at Pier 48 in San Francisco. Last year, Elastic{ON} was a huge success, but don’t take our word for it. Check out what attendees had to say about the user conference and get in {ON} it this year. Learn about the next Elastic{ON} »

video:video.video:title: Cyber Security Log Analytics at Decision Lab
video:video.video:description: Buiding a seamless Cyber Security analytics tool starts by choosing the right stack. The team at Decision Lab shares how they've deployed Kibana, Logstash, Elasticsearch, Angular, and Node to replace Hadoop and Splunk. Other insights include architecture, automation, and deployment best practices.

video:video.video:title: What’s Evolving in the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, Logstash에 대한 제품 로드맵을 살펴보고, 모든 기능에 대한 데모와 발표를 보실 수 있습니다.

video:video.video:title: Machine Learning avec Elastic (French)
video:video.video:description: Comment fonctionne le machine learning d'Elastic, et comment l'utiliser pour traquer des données anormales dans votre SI.

video:video.video:title: Mise en place d’un produit Log as a service avec Elasticsearch (French)
video:video.video:description: Nicolas explique dans cette vidéo la plateforme Log as a service opérée en interne chez Orange et basée sur Elasticsearch.

video:video.video:title: Lyft's Wild Ride from Amazon ES to Self-Managed Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: From October 2016 to May 2017, Lyft was Amazon's biggest hosted Elasticsearch customer and most frequent support headache. After quickly scaling to the maximum supported size — and then beyond — Lyft found themselves keeping one big support ticket open to address daily (and sometimes hourly) incidents. It was clearly time for a change. After two intense weeks of migration, Lyft became self-hosted, and both companies breathed a sigh of relief. How did Lyft get there from here? What are the pros and cons of cloud versus self-hosted Elasticsearch deployments? And what has Lyft learned from almost a year of operating their own cluster? Michael Goldsby of Lyft's observability team talks you through the joys and sorrows of scaling a logging cluster from 300,000 to 3 million events per minute. Want to learn more about the differences between the Amazon Elasticsearch Service and our official Elasticsearch Service? Visit our AWS Elasticsearch comparison page.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch SQL (2017)
video:video.video:description: Do you find yourself pointing new Elasticsearch users every which way to various reference guides, language documentations, and example console snippets? Are you onboarding new Elasticsearch users to your company/organization and trying to get them up to speed? Come see what Costin's been cookin'! In this session, you'll get a taste of a new Elastic {Re}search project and some of the recipes behind it. Costin will discuss how Elastic is working to make Elasticsearch more accessible to users, applications, and systems. Join us and bring your own ideas and an open mind.

video:video.video:title: 合作伙伴讲座：阿里云
video:video.video:description: 吴迪来自阿里巴巴 Elasticsearch 云服务团队，阿里云 Elasticsearch 将运维人员从繁琐和重复的工作中解放出来，降低运维成本，实现业务系统的高可用性，而智能的运维帮助业务系统进一步提升运维效率和整体稳定性。智能运维已经支撑了我们几千数量的集群，本次将和大家分享阿里云 Elasticsearch 从自动化运维系统到智能运维的演进道路上的经验。

video:video.video:title: Fantastic, Bombastic, Elastic: You Know, for Amazing New Experiences at R+V Versicherung (in German)
video:video.video:description: In this talk Markus and Bernd will describe how Elasticsearch was introduced as a new technology at R+V for Log Monitoring and Customer Search. They will also speak to the amazing new experiences they've had with the entire Elastic Stack in combination with other solutions such as Apache Spark. Excited to share their road map, Markus and Bernd will present their ideas on some interesting Elasticsearch use cases they R & V are exploring for the near future.

video:video.video:title: Ship Your Own Data: Tailoring Beats to Your Use Case
video:video.video:description: Beats is a little bit like LEGO: You can use each Beat itself as a building block to cover your needs, but at the same time each Beat consists of different reusable and extendable elements. This makes it possible for developers and operators to combine and extend Beats in different ways.In this talk, Nicolas and Steffen will introduce developers, operators, and Beats users to the internals of the Elastic Beats. The knowledge gained will help with making informed decisions on how to extend Beats to deal with your particular use case if it’s not fully-covered by the existing Beats features.

video:video.video:title: Conferencia principal
video:video.video:description: Escucha hablar directamente a los creadores del stack sobre el futuro de Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats y Logstash, las características y soluciones nuevas, las opciones de despliegue que se amplían y el panorama de soluciones en evolución.

video:video.video:title: REX on the implementation of elastic at Vente Privée (French)
video:video.video:description: Comment nous avons monté au fil des années une architecture multi-cluster Elastic pour les équipes Back Office de vente-privee et quels ont été les problèmes techniques et organisationnels rencontrés.

video:video.video:title: Architecture at Scale - Madrid 2020
video:video.video:description: Crece con confianza. Desde tu portátil hasta numerosos nodos o despliegues para diversos casos de uso y clústeres, nuestros expertos de Elastic comparten las mejores prácticas que hay que saber dominar y los obstáculos que hay que evitar para escalar Elasticsearch.

video:video.video:title: Ingestion 5.0 : Beats et Logstash (French)
video:video.video:description: Logstash, Filebeat, Packetbeat, Winlogbeat… avez-vous entendu parler de Metricbeat ? Et oui, il y a beaucoup de choses à connaître à propos de l'ingestion de données dans la Suite Elastic. Mettez-vous à niveau !

video:video.video:title: Customer Story(Builton): 고성능과 고가용성에 기반한 온라인 이커머스 빅데이터의 효율적인 분석을 위한 Elasticsearch의 선택
video:video.video:description: 아무리 Scale-up해도 일정 이상 좋아지지 않는 성능, 너무나 과도한 개발과 테스트 욕심으로 발생한관리포인트의 증가, 시스템을 모두 운영하면서 발생하는 관리의 어려움, 복제 문제점 발생 등등...그러면서 잦은 Downtime이 발생...이 모든 원인은 과도한 개발 욕심, 그리고 이렇게 데이터가 많을 줄 몰랐고, 이렇게 시스템이 느릴 줄 몰랐고, 최신 분석 트랜드를 도입하지 못한 것에 대한 후회무엇을 바꿔야 할까?무엇을 선택해야 할까?ElasticSearch를 만나기전 RDBMS Cluster, CouchBase, HDFS를 테스트...그리고 최악의 상황이 발생. 특정 고객사가 3분이나 걸리는 실시간 리포트를 클릭하자마자 나오게 해달라고 함과도한 요구사항이었으며, 미리 집계해서 해결할 수 없는 상태였습니다. 입력 파라미터가 계속 바뀌기 때문입니다. 또한 너무나 연산량이 많은 것도 단점입니다. 그래서 우리는 ElasticSearch를 도입하여 기존 시스템에서 3분이나 걸리는 리포팅을 단 3초만에 랜더링 합니다.

video:video.video:title: ¿Está Buscando Un Doctor? Kyruus' Guide to Find a Doctor in Spanish
video:video.video:description: Kyruus believes every patient has a right to access medical care. However, most provider searches at hospitals fail to serve a large population: Spanish speakers. That's why Kyruus is developing solutions to help the 40 million Spanish speakers in the US search for and find the most clinically relevant medical providers.Software engineer Michelle Chen explains how Kyruus uses certain Elasticsearch features to create a better Spanish-language search experience. She discusses the differences between Spanish and English text searches and how Kyruus adds medical jargon search capabilities to both languages.You will learn tips for better serving Spanish speakers in all search-based applications so you can start your own multilingual search project.

video:video.video:title: Tokyo 2017: Ingest and the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Logstash 5.xのデータ投入についてご紹介します。また、軽量データシッパーであるBeatsに加わったHeartbeatやMetricbeatについてもご説明します。

video:video.video:title: End-to-End Security Analytics with the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Interested in staying ahead of the adversary in a shifting security landscape? Learn how to create a centralized security analytics platform with the speed and scale you need for ad hoc analysis during threat detection and hunting exercises.

video:video.video:title: Canvas para Criar Infográficos em Tempo Real
video:video.video:description: Conheça os bastidores e descubra como o Canvas lhe ajudará a criar visualizações em tempo real com perfeição e inspiradas em infográficos no Kibana. Além disso, veja como a nova linguagem Elasticsearch SQL se conecta com o Canvas.

video:video.video:title: Electric{Search} de 0 à 400 volts chez Polyconseil
video:video.video:description: Chez Blue-Solutions by Polyconseil, nous utilisons Elasticsearch pour stocker et indexer des données de télémétrie provenant de milliers de « blue devices » (véhicules électriques, points de recharge, batteries, etc.) afin de générer des alertes, d'analyser et de mieux comprendre leurs comportements. Dans cette présentation nous montrerons comment nous avons entièrement automatisé le déploiement de clusters Elasticsearch (on-premise) en utilisant Ansible et comment nous comptons, à l’avenir avec Elasticsearch, en apprendre encore plus sur nos « blue devices ».

video:video.video:title: Welcome to Elastic{ON}17 Tour London
video:video.video:description: Get an update from Shay on the latest Elastic Stack innovations.

video:video.video:title: 決済サービスの監視を支えるElastic Stack (Japanese)
video:video.video:description: 膨大な取引データ、サービス提供状態の可視化やElastic Machine Learningによる異常検知の仕組化など、年間取扱額2兆円を超える決済システムを支えるElastic活用事例をお話しします。また、システムリソース以外のビジネスデータの可視化についても取り上げます。

video:video.video:title: Expanding Elasticsearch: Learn How to Leverage Heterogeneous Compute to Extend and Accelerate Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Search-based analytics are a critical function for any organization, so it’s no surprise that Elasticsearch is the go-to engine to power these queries. However, the limitations of today’s traditional x86-based data analytics infrastructures often hinder or delay companies from getting the immediate insights they need to run a smart, data-driven business.To solve this, Al and Pat will show you how Ryft leverages FPGA/x86 heterogeneous compute technology to eliminate indexing and transformation, in addition to providing enhanced Elasticsearch functionality that accelerates workflows, increases the speed of search and analysis, and enhances wildcard searches.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stackの進化
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch、Kibana、Beats、そしてLogstashの最新ロードマップをデモやプレゼンテーションでご紹介します。ロールアップからElasticsearch SQLまで、新機能をいち早くチェックできます。

video:video.video:title: Seeing a Better World with Big & Heavy GeoSpatial Data at DigitalGlobe
video:video.video:description: DigitalGlobe is an industry leader in GeoSpatial Search and Analytics Handling data at a ludicrous scale. They utilize Elasticsearch to drill down on their 90PB data archive of vector imagery. This talk focuses on how and why DigitalGlobe chose Elasticsearch and how they've architected and deployed it to give their clients - including aid organizations in Nepal - instant access to their full geospatial database in order to deliver life-saving services.

video:video.video:title: Opening Keynote - IBM
video:video.video:description: IBM discusses the Bluemix platform and how it enables logging with the Elastic Stack. Take your interconnected, cloud-hosted micro services and bring them together quickly and simply so you spend less time instrumenting your app for logging applications and more time enhancing it. The Bluemix platform uses multitenant systems to offer a large scale, personalized Elastic Stack logging experience.

video:video.video:title: B-b-b-b-b-beats! How to Build Your Own
video:video.video:description: The Beats project has evolved from just one Beat – Packetbeat – to several Beats, many of which are written by users like you. In this talk, join Beats core developers Nicolas and Steffen in their whirlwind attempt at creating a new Beat, live, from scratch!

video:video.video:title: Partner Story(IMGURU): 아이엠:토라 제품 소개 (엘라스틱 Vega를 이용한 마케팅 분석 솔루션)
video:video.video:description: 엘라스틱 Vega를 이용한 솔루션 아이엠:토라는 다양하게 표현되는 현재의 소프트웨어 시장에서 데이터 에너지의 생산 도구입니다. 데이터 에너지는 업무 담당자에게는 생각의 힘이 되고, 기획자에게는 아이디어의 원천이 되며, 보안담당자에게는 배테랑들의 노하우를 시스템을 통해 전달 받을 수 있는 경로를 확보 하게끔 합니다. 아이엠:토라는 이제까지 하던 일을 더 잘 하는 평범한 소프트웨어를 넘어 할 수 없던 일들을 가능하게 하는 소프트웨어임을 자부합니다.

video:video.video:title: Surfacing the Products You Love on Spring
video:video.video:description: Spring is a digital shopping destination that helps customers quickly find the products they love. They’re using Elasticsearch to return more relevant search results on their catalog of more than 300,000 products.Learn how the Spring team builds a product catalog with Elasticsearch. Hear how they ensure product data is synced with information from external vendors — including product-specific metadata. Take a closer look at their Elasticsearch ingestion process, where they use cron jobs and NSQ to update products at least once every 12 hours. Plus, learn about projects the Spring team has tackled to improve their index and better understand their users' intent, including text search improvements with natural language processing (NLP) and refining products by color.

video:video.video:title: Otto: Das Echtzeit Elastic (DE)
