video:video.video:description: Argos, one of the UK's leading digital retailers, serves millions of customers and boasts a catalogue of more than 70,000 products. In the past 18 months they have transitioned from a WebSphere Commerce + Solr monolith environment to an Elasticsearch-powered microservice-based infrastructure. This change improved search relevancy and performance, provided new features, and led to higher customer satisfaction. Find out how they were able to get through Black Friday 2016 with zero downtime across search and how their plans to beat that achievement in 2017 turned out. Plus see how Elasticsearch helps them deliver a consistent search experience across all channels. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: US Public Sector (Virtual) 2020: Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability
video:video.video:description: Learn how Elasticsearch efficiently combines data in a single store and how Kibana is used to analyze it. Plus, see how recent developments help identify, troubleshoot, and resolve operational issues faster.

video:video.video:title: Inside Elastic Engineering
video:video.video:description: Get insights and ask questions about the ever-evolving journey of Elastic engineering. This talk will cover what changed as we grew from 15 to 150+, how we operate as a global distributed team and communicate effectively, as well as what guides us in developing the software you know and (hopefully) love.

video:video.video:title: What's Evolving in Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: 2,236 pull requests by 333 committers — that's what it took to go from 5.0 to 6.0. Built on top of Lucene 7.0, the latest version of Elasticsearch includes faster restarts with sequence IDs, support for sparse data, and index sorting, with many new features still to come. Learn where the Elasticsearch roadmap is headed with new features and prepare for what's next.

video:video.video:title: Graph Capabilities in the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: If you've ever wanted to provide recommendations or identify the behavior of malicious actors, this is the session for you. Come learn about how Elasticsearch can power graph exploration at scale by collecting signals like clicks or purchases to identify meaningful connections between subjects on-the-fly.

video:video.video:title: Security Analytics Webinar French Episode 2
video:video.video:description:
Avant d'analyser, apprenons à centraliser des données – trafic réseau, événements système, logs applicatifs – en les enrichissant qualitativement d’informations de sécurité ! Nous verrons l’utilité de capter et normaliser les informations du SI à des fins de Security Analytics, en particulier l’usage complémentaire des logs et autres données permettant d’investiguer en partant des anomalies détectées. L'enrichissement qualitatif de ces informations – avec des bases de connaissance externes (type threat intelligence), signatures d'IDS, AD, CMDB et autres – permet ainsi un classement en amont des activités suspicieuses Durant ce webinar, nous apprendrons :
Quelles données capturer et comment les capter : usage des Beats et modules ad hoc. Comment enrichir les données avec Logstash, en combinant les plugins internes et sources externes. Comment utiliser le schéma de données Elastic (ECS) pour partager les modules d’ingestion, visualisations ou jobs de Machine LearningBonne nouvelle ! Les principales fonctionnalités de sécurité de la Suite Elastic sont désormais gratuites. En savoir plus. Elastic SIEM : découvrez un nouvel ensemble d'intégration de données pour les cas d'usage en sécurité. Avec notre nouvelle application dédiée sur Kibana, les professionnels de la sécurité peuvent plus efficacement analyser et trier les flux provenant de serveurs communs ainsi que ceux provenant du réseaux de sécurité. Essayez notre nouvel outil.

video:video.video:title: Security Analytics Webinar French Episode 1
video:video.video:description:
Découvrez comment utiliser Elastic et ses fonctionnalités d’analytique avancées pour construire une plateforme de Security Analytics pouvant répondre à vos exigences de volumétrie et de rapidité d’investigation. Après un bref rappel des composants de la Suite Elastic, nous montrerons des cas concrets de détection d’attaque comme l’aspiration robotisée (scraping), l’exfiltration de données, le scan de ports ou encore l’élévation de privilèges.  En combinant un ensemble d’outils - de la capture réseau à la modélisation applicative comportementale, nous illustrerons les fonctionnalités qui font de la Suite Elastic le choix d’organisations comme Slack, Vente Privée ou USAA. Ce webinar vous montrera :
Pourquoi Elastic est une solution idéale pour réaliser des analyses de sécurité, par ses qualités de rapidité et d’analytique. Comment concrètement mettre en oeuvre Elastic dans le périmètre de votre infrastructure au travers d’exemples d’architecture type. Comment utiliser Elastic en remplacement ou en complément d’un SIEM traditionnel. Ceci est le premier épisode dans une série de trois sur L'Analyse de Sécurité avec Elasticsearch, voir les prochains épisodes :
Episode 2 Episode 3 Bonne nouvelle ! Les principales fonctionnalités de sécurité de la Suite Elastic sont désormais gratuites. En savoir plus. Elastic SIEM : découvrez un nouvel ensemble d'intégration de données pour les cas d'usage en sécurité. Avec notre nouvelle application dédiée sur Kibana, les professionnels de la sécurité peuvent plus efficacement analyser et trier les flux provenant de serveurs communs ainsi que ceux provenant du réseaux de sécurité. Essayez notre nouvel outil.

video:video.video:title: Performance Monitoring with the ELK Stack: collectd
video:video.video:description: Logstash isn't just for logs! Did you know that Logstash can translate all kind of data into metrics you can use to monitor and track system performance? One of these plugins allows Logstash to collect data from collectd. collectd is a metric collecting and delivery program with dozens of plugins which range from Apache to ZFS, databases, hardware performance metrics and so much more.Learn how Logstash can help you start to keep track of your performance metric data!

video:video.video:title: Tokyo 2017: Machine Learning Deep Dive
video:video.video:description: 5.5でリリースされたMachine Learningは時系列データの異常検知を可能にしました。本セッションでは、NGINXログの投入から、情報付加、可視化、分析、そして異常の予測まで、Elastic Stackを利用した手順をご覧いただきます。

video:video.video:title: Powering Postbank Group’s Data-driven Strategy
video:video.video:description: Postbank Systems is a full-service IT provider that centrally bundles the IT expertise of the Postbank Group. They offer stable, secure, and high-quality IT systems and services that are the backbone of the Group. Postbank Systems uses the Elastic Stack to power Big Data opportunities and support the bank in their effort to adopt a scalable, data-driven approach. See how the Elastic Stack enables Postbank Systems to drive the digital transformation  from monitoring bank branches and ATMs and creating an antifraud system, to ensuring that the Postbank Group is GDPR compliant.

video:video.video:title: Tokyo 2017: Elasticsearch Deep Dive (Japanese)
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch 5.xでどのような機能や変更が行われたのか。アップグレードやスケール、リカバリ、ディスク使用量などの懸念事項について、6.xではどのように進化していくのかを解説します。

video:video.video:title: Elastic{ON} Tour New York Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: Elastic CEO Shay Banon kicked off the conference with big announcements and updates on Elastic App Search, Elastic APM, SQL for Elasticsearch, the infographic-tastic Canvas, rollups in Elasticsearch, and the decision to open the code of X-Pack.

video:video.video:title: Elasticon 2018 Roadmap Recap
video:video.video:description:
Elastic{ON} 2018, la conférence utilisateurs Elasticsearch officielle, vient de se terminer et vous avez peut être déjà entendu parler de nos nombreuses annonces produits et roadmaps, ainsi que des avancements de machine learning, APM, site search et plus encore. Ce webinar vous donnera un aperçu des faits saillants de la conférence et vous permettra de poser toutes vos questions à nos experts. Les sujets abordés seront :
Elasticsearch : Configuration de tâche périodiques qui « roll-up » ou pré-agrègent les données stockées dans un index et le rendent disponible à la recherche. Kibana : Nouvelles visualisations avec Canvas et amélioration des capacités de géolocalisation pour intégrer les cartes dans vos tableaux de bord. APM : Suivre et optimiser la performance de vos applications. Elastic Cloud et Elastic Cloud Enterprise : Flexibilité augmentée dans l’hébergement et la gestion des clusters Ouverture du code de X-Pack : Comprendre pourquoi et comment nous rendons le code de X-Pack public.

video:video.video:title: NASA: Unlocking Interplanetary Datasets with Real-Time Search
video:video.video:description: JPL is using Elasticsearch in many areas of its business and currently have two main areas they would like to show. One application is flight telemetry and system dashboards from Curiosity and SMAP. The application takes production data and gives an easy way for engineers to monitor and measure instruments given back from our spacecraft. The other application is one that affects all employees at JPL as Elasticsearch now powers JPL's internal search engine including a powerful video and people search.

video:video.video:title: Tsunamis, Drones, Refugee Camps and STACK (French)
video:video.video:description:
Présentation des utilisations de STACK par L’ONG HAND (Hackers Against Natural Disasters).
Contrôle de l’espace aérien et archivage des trajectoires de drones automatisés. Optimisation et monitoring de la distribution d’eau dans le camp de réfugiées de Zaatari en Jordanie.

video:video.video:title: What's Cooking in Kibana? (2017)
video:video.video:description: Much has happened in Kibana since 5.0, as we've doubled down on new stack management and data visualization capabilities like never before.Court and Jim will go through some rad features that have been released since 5.0, and will then highlight some of the most exciting changes that will be shipping in upcoming releases.Heatmap, log context, pipeline aggregations, CSV export . . . and that's just the start!

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ Adobe: Making Search Smarter with Machine Learning at Scale
video:video.video:description: Hear how Adobe scales, manages multiple use cases, and puts machine learning features to work with Elastic. Learn about extensions to Elasticsearch that allow them to search at scale and see how these extensions have allowed the teams at Adobe to support novel applications like multi-image similarity, semantic querying, face similarity, visual clustering, auto tagging, and more. Plus, hear how they migrated away from Amazon's Elasticsearch Service to a self-managed Elasticsearch cluster for Adobe Lightroom.

video:video.video:title: Deep Learning & Accelerating the NLP Journey in the Unstructured World at Credit Suisse
video:video.video:description: Credit Suisse is looking for a needle in a haystack, and they're using the Elastic Stack to find it. Their deep learning solution is used in the eCommunications surveillance space, operates in the unstructured data space, and leverages GPU technology. The underlying data platform is built on Elastic.Hear how the Credit Suisse team is leveraging cutting-edge natural language processing (NLP) techniques to surface potential malicious activity by reducing noise and false positives. You'll also see how they're using this deep learning solution to provide emotional and sentiment context.

video:video.video:title: Elastic as a Fundamental Core to Pfizer’s Scientific Data Cloud
video:video.video:description: In 2015, Pfizer Digital began building out a data lake called the Scientific Data Cloud (SDC). Earlier implementations of this were strictly Hadoop-based, but indexing content in the lake became a necessity, requiring other solutions. Pfizer turned to Elastic, which quickly became a key part of their infrastructure. Hear Kimberly Butler and Jim Silva discuss how Pfizer Digital uses Elastic in a good manufacturing practice (GMP) environment for indexing, audit reporting, and near real-time metric dashboarding, and how the Elastic Stack has become an integral part of the data lake solution at Pfizer.

video:video.video:title: Small, Medium, or Large: Evolve Your Elastic Stack to Fit
video:video.video:description: The few thousands operations per second indexing requirement has changed to few millions; the single use case has grown to multiple; the one user group has become tens of user groups. In this talk, Sherry will take you through the Elastic Stack topologies from small to large to meet your evolving use case(s). She will examine deployment patterns for projects of various sizes, using Beats, Elasticsearch, Kibana, Logstash, X-Pack, and others.

video:video.video:title: Managing Elasticsearch Clusters with Elastic Cloud Enterprise (Korean)
video:video.video:description: Learn how to easily deploy and manage secure Elasticsearch clusters at scale and on the infrastructure of your choice using Elastic Cloud Enterprise.

video:video.video:title: Machine Learning Deep Dive Session
video:video.video:description: Complex, fast-moving datasets make it nearly impossible to spot infrastructure problems, intruders, or business issues as they happen. See how machine learning can uncover insights from your data, all by itself.

video:video.video:title: Partner Story(Megazone): 금융사 실전 프로젝트 DeepDive
video:video.video:description: Elastic 을 활용한 금융사 실전 프로젝트를 통해 Audit, 개인정보 비식별화 이슈 해결 사례 및 ES-Hadoop 간 데이터 연계,Watcher를 통한 실시간 Trigger 에 대한 경험, 고려 사항 등을 고객분들과 공유합니다.

video:video.video:title: Writing Logstash Plugins in the 5.X Era
video:video.video:description: Learn how to write plugins for Logstash and what goodies the 5.X version line will bring to the plugin developer. João will cover the basics, as well as how to write a Java-based plugin, how to instrument your plugin with metrics, and more!

video:video.video:title: Machine Learning: Elastic Stackを利用した異常検知
video:video.video:description: X-Packの新機能であるMachine Learningを利用した異常検知について、デモを交えてご紹介します。

video:video.video:title: Get the Lay of the Lucene Land (2017)
video:video.video:description: In spite of being close to 20 years old, the Lucene project keeps innovating. While the project was initially focused on full-text search, recent releases expanded its scope, most notably with doc values which made Lucene a competitive engine to run analytics, and multi-dimensional points which made Lucene better at handling structured data. In this session, Adrien will share the stories between the latest features in Lucene 6, how they impacted Elasticsearch, as well as what to expect in Lucene 7.

video:video.video:title: Opening Keynote 2018
video:video.video:description: Hear the Elastic vision for new products, features, solutions, and deployment options straight from Elasticsearch creator Shay Banon.

video:video.video:title: The Quick Starter Stack for Robotics, IoT, and Big Data
video:video.video:description: OTTO Motors, a division of Clearpath™ Inc., designs, manufactures, and operates self-driving vehicles with the ultimate goal of making factory and warehouse environments, safe, efficient, and agile. OTTO Motors has been using the Elastic Stack to ramp up and deliver their technology to customers for the past year at scale — fast discovery and action on results! In this presentation, the OTTO Motors team shares their tips, tricks, and lessons learned along the way as well as some of the real-world benefits they’ve seen using Elastic to power their global Internet of Things (IoT) starter stack. Learn why they call Logstash the best-kept secret in rapid turnkey, edge-computing data collection. See how Elastic transformed labor intensive workflows into real-time insights, and how HAProxy, RunDeck, Curator and many other tools all became best friends, keeping things secure and easily manageable. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: Cas d'usage d'Elasticsearch pour un panel de statistiques by Pricing Assistant - Paris Meetup February 2016 (FR)
video:video.video:description: Pricing Assistant crawle tous les prix du web et les présente dans une interface à ses clients e-commerçants pour qu'ils ajustent leurs prix par rapport à la concurrence. Je détaillerais dans ce retour d'expérience comment nous avons migré notre API REST de MongoDB à Elasticsearch, notre façon d'utiliser des indexes "jetables" pour chaque client et un post-mortem sur un downtime causé par cette approche il y a 2 mois.

video:video.video:title: Optimisation des flux physiques grâce à Elasticsearch by DCbrain - Paris Meetup February 2016 (French)
video:video.video:description: La présentation montrera comment les capacités d'indexation et de traitement des séries temporelles d'Elasticsearch peuvent être utilisées conjointement à une base de graphe pour optimiser des réseaux de flux physiques. Les uses cases types sont les flux physiques des datacenters ou les smartgrids. DCbrain est lauréat du concours Réseaux électriques intelligents d'ERDF grâce à cette approche.

video:video.video:title: Brazil (Virtual) 2020: Search for All with Elastic Workplace Search
video:video.video:description: Saiba como reinventamos a busca no local de trabalho para que você possa acessar rapidamente as informações necessárias com uma experiência de busca unificada, conectores de dados prontos para uso e interfaces simples de gerenciamento de busca.

video:video.video:title: US Public Sector (Virtual) 2020: Elastic Security: Enterprise Protection Built on the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Elastic Security provides global data threat prevention, collection, detection, and response. Learn how to outpace the adversaries with multi-layered technology, see live demos, and get answers to all your questions.

video:video.video:title: France (Virtual) 2020: Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability
video:video.video:description: Découvrez comment Elasticsearch centralise le stockage des données et comment exploiter Kibana pour les analyser. Sans oublier l'accélération de l'identification, du diagnostic et de la résolution des problèmes.

video:video.video:title: Asia Pacific (Virtual) 2020: Search for All with Elastic Workplace Search
video:video.video:description: Learn how we reimagined search in the workplace so you can get to the information you need quickly with a unified search experience, out-of-the-box data connectors, and simple search management interfaces.

video:video.video:title: Asia Pacific (Virtual) 2020: Elastic Security: Enterprise Protection Built on the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Elastic Security provides global data threat prevention, collection, detection, and response. Learn how to outpace the adversaries with multi-layered technology, see live demos, and get answers to all your questions.

video:video.video:title: ElasticFR Meetup Rennes #1 : The Beats Family (French)
video:video.video:description: Maxime Odye vous présente la famille Beats et leurs intérêts. Découvrez la mise en place 'out of the box', les dashboards Kibana clés en main mais aussi un exemple d'architecture plus compliqué avec un broker (type RabbitMQ ou Kafka) et l'intégration Jolokia pour le monitoring de logs JVM. Maxime fait un focus particulier sur Metricbeat et évoque également l'intégration avec Docker.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch: Search & Analyze Data in Real Time (with French subtitles)
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch is a distributed, open source search and analytics engine, designed for horizontal scalability, reliability, and easy management. It combines the speed of search with the power of analytics via a sophisticated, developer-friendly query language covering structured, unstructured, and time-series data.

video:video.video:title: Cancer Risk Factors Analysis from Open Data
video:video.video:description: Olivier de Fresnoye présente Epidemium et son programme de data challenge initiant de nouvelles approches autour de la recherche contre le cancer avec l’open data. Grand Prix de ce programme, l'organisation OpenCancer a développé un outil d'aide à la prévention à partir de modèles prédictifs ainsi qu'une plateforme associée dont le coeur est la suite Elastic pour rassembler et visualiser les données. Les quatre protagonistes de ce projet sont Benjamin SCHANNES, Martin MICALEF, Benoît ROLLAND et Lino GALIANA. Trois d’entre eux présentent ces travaux.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch 5.0 : tout ce que vous devez savoir
video:video.video:description: Dans cette présentation, vous découvrirez tout ce qu'il y a à savoir sur les nouveautés d'Elasticsearch : Ingest Node, les agrégations instantanées, la prise en charge d'IPv6 ou encore les améliorations apportées aux types de données champs, aux suggestions de remplissage automatique et à la résilience.

video:video.video:title: Un plugin qui écoute pour mieux comprendre (French)
video:video.video:description: Je décrirai ce qui m'a amené à créer un nouveau plugin d'analyse de texte et pourquoi l'utilisation des plugins d'analyses existants n'a pas aboutie.Ensuite j'expliquerai le fonctionnement du plugin et donnerai la marche à suivre pour l'utiliser dans son projet avec une version d'Elasticsearch spécifiée.Je finirai en expliquant les évolutions à venir.

video:video.video:title: Build Your Own Filebeat Module
video:video.video:description: Filebeat is a single-purpose data shipper designed to forward events from any text file containing log messages to Elasticsearch. It comes with internal modules (Apache, NGINX, System, and MySQL) that simplify the collection, parsing, and visualization of common log formats down to a single command. But what if you're working with an unsupported log format? First, don't panic! Second, create your own module.Learn how to tailor existing modules to meet your logging needs. Get a complete walkthrough of building a new module from scratch using the tools provided by Filebeat.

video:video.video:title: The Path to Intelligent Operation with NetApp OnCommand Insight
video:video.video:description: OnCommand Insight is a sophisticated management and monitoring product for hybrid IT infrastructures on public clouds, private clouds, and on-premises environments. The platform collects telemetry from applications and systems, network, and storage infrastructure, and the analytics are built on Elasticsearch and use X-Pack machine learning features to alert on anomalous system behavior.Learn about the technical architecture of the product, including the tradeoffs and design decisions that led to replacing Cassandra with Elasticsearch, optimizing Elasticsearch for an embedded use-case, and the move from alerting based on static thresholds to using X-Pack machine learning features. Plus, hear about lessons learned and insights from running Elasticsearch embedded in our product at hundreds of customers.

video:video.video:title: Monitoring with Elastic Machine Learning at Sky
video:video.video:description: The dynamic nature and the complex viewing patterns across Sky’s over-the-top (OTT) propositions makes threshold alerting unsuitable except for detecting the most extreme of outages.In this talk, Simon Quain and Jamie Lynch will explain how Sky leveraged the power of Elastic machine learning features, processing over seven billion documents to help discover trends, learn from real-time data, and generate alerts when anomalies occur. This solution has unearthed issues generating alerts down to device and proposition level, which may have been detected much later or not at all using previous techniques.

video:video.video:title: Turning Evidence into Insights: How NCIS Leverages Elastic
video:video.video:description: In the fight against online crime, time is of the essence. Many criminal investigators don't have a degree in Computer Science, creating a  need for tools that quickly and easily produce actionable insights. The NCIS Cyber Directorate leverages the descriptive power and scalability of Elasticsearch to create customized tools and turn evidence into insights that a Special Agent can integrate into their investigation. Learn how NCIS data analysis uses Elasticsearch to process evidence in the form of log files, its impact on efficient law enforcement, and some lessons learned along the way.

video:video.video:title: Machine Learning and Statistical Methods for Time Series Analysis
video:video.video:description: Machine learning now in beta. Register now for the upcoming webinar, overview demo, and live Q&A. In this talk, Steve and Tom will present a deep algorithmic dive into the new machine learning technologies available in the Elastic Stack and how they can be applied to real datasets. Specifically, they will focus on some of the unsupervised machine learning techniques Elastic uses, and the challenges and constraints which exist in order to provide operationally useful insight when applying these technologies to real time series data.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Cloud Enterprise @ Cisco
video:video.video:description: Sujith Joseph was one of the earliest adopters of Elastic Cloud Enterprise (ECE). Hear his experiences running ECE in production as Cisco UCS Integrated Infrastructure and learn about the design and configurations that help Cisco index over 3 billion documents each day at a rate of ~400K docs per second using Apache Spark. Plus, see how Elasticsearch machine learning helps Cisco discover custom entities within queries on Cisco.com and how ECE has helped Cisco foster innovation and increase agility for search-based solutions and enabled faster realization of business goals.

video:video.video:title: Finding the Right Tool for the Job: Elastic at The Home Depot
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch has become the most trusted tool in the arsenal of The Home Depot, as the company has moved to Elastic solutions for product search, event logging/visualization, percolation for discounting rules management, etc.

video:video.video:title: Will County Sheriff’s Office: Solving Crime with Data
video:video.video:description: The Will County Sheriff’s Office found Elastic through a bit of curiosity. Testing the Elastic Stack during free time, the Sheriff's Office learned the basic concepts of what comprises Elasticsearch, Kibana and Logstash. That discovery sparked a major paradigm shift that continues to grow as they implement three major use cases with version 7.2. Learn how the Elastic Stack gave a flexible foundation for the Sheriff's Office to build solutions for Network Monitoring and Security, Operational Analysis at the Will County Adult Detention Facility, and for Crime Analysis in their area.

video:video.video:title: Stories from the Trenches at GoDaddy: How Big Data Insights Equal Big Money
video:video.video:description: GoDaddy is ingesting and analyzing more than 200,000 data points per second to improve customer experience and operations. They're using the Elastic Stack along with X-Pack and technologies like Kafka, Spark, and Hadoop to perform real-time anomaly detection, log analysis, and auto-remediation daily on over 10 TB of new data across their products and systems. Take a journey through their transformation from a farm of data silos to a centralized platform that ingests, analyzes, and visualizes data throughout the enterprise. Learn how they collect and use data from products like Hosting and Domains to analyze infrastructure events across their fleet of 85,000 servers and network devices. Plus, see how they leverage data in real time to answer key business questions. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: This Paper Has Been Plagiarized: How Blackboard Curbs Cheating with Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Blackboard leverages Elasticsearch to power SafeAssign, its plagiarism detection software. In this talk, Slavomir will walk through some aspects of the service, show how their internal web search engine was born, as well as walk through Blackboard’s journey from a small scale Solr deployment to a multi-terabyte, full-text search engine powered by Elasticsearch. Attendees will also learn from Blackboard’s experiences, challenges, solutions, and best practices from running their infrastructure on AWS.

video:video.video:title: Americas East (Virtual) 2020: Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: Hear from Elastic CEO Shay Banon on the future of Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, and Logstash, new features and solutions, expanding deployment options, and the evolving solutions landscape.

video:video.video:title: What's the Latest in Logstash? (2017)
video:video.video:description: This session attempts to address one of life’s ultimate questions: how many logs can a Logstash stash? Suyog and Jordan will answer this and other burning Logstash questions, like: can we go faster? What is this persistent queue thing? Any cool new plugin developments? How do I monitor Logstash? What is in the future for the Logstash configuration? How does the Logstash team keep sysadmins and DevOps in mind when working on the product? Is Logstash ever going to get a UI?Expect to leave with a clear vision of where Logstash is headed and how it fits in as a critical part of your infrastructure.

video:video.video:title: The Book on Genesis Media: Analyzing Data, and It Was Good!
video:video.video:description: From simple grepping Apache logs to full-fledged analysis, the evolution of log analytics at Genesis Media has allowed them to grow, to meet the demands of their publishers, and to provide a great and targeted ad delivery product. In this talk, VP of Technology Rob Schwartzberg walks through the lessons learned and the steps along the way to their current success, including a look at why the Elastic stack served their needs better than Splunk could.

video:video.video:title: Between Two Ferns with Huddle
video:video.video:description: A chat with Richard Owens, Senior Systems Engineer at Huddle, about using the Elastic stack to overcome a scalability issue and high maintenance costs.
